segment.source: What's New in NVDA
segment.target: NVDA šta je novo

segment.source: The Add-on Store will now notify you if any add-on updates are available on NVDA startup.
segment.target: Prodavnica dodataka će vas sada obavestiti ako postoje ažuriranja za vaše dodatke kada se NVDA pokrene.

segment.source: There are now options to apply Unicode normalization to speech and braille output.
segment.target: Sada postoje opcije za unikodno standardizovanje govornog i brajevog izlaza.

segment.source: This can be useful when reading characters that are unknown to a particular speech synthesizer or braille table and which have a compatible alternative, like the bold and italic characters commonly used on social media.
segment.target: Ovo može biti korisno kada se čitaju znakovi koji su nepoznati određenom sintetizatoru govora ili brajevoj tabeli a koji imaju kompatibilnu alternativu, kao što su podebljani i iskošeni znakovi koji se često koriste na društvenim mrežama.

segment.source: It also allows reading of equations in the Microsoft Word equation editor.
segment.target: Takođe dozvoljava čitanje matematičkih zadataka u Microsoft Word uređivaču zadataka.

segment.source: Help Tech Activator Pro braille displays are now supported.
segment.target: Help Tech Activator Pro brajevi redovi su sada podržani.

segment.source: Unassigned commands have been added to scroll the mouse wheel vertically and horizontally.
segment.target: Dodate su komande bez dodeljene prečice kako biste vertikalno i horizontalno pomerali točkić miša.

segment.source: There are several bug fixes, particularly for the Windows 11 Emoji Panel and Clipboard history.
segment.target: Ispravljeno je nekoliko grešaka, mogu se izdvojiti ispravke za Windows 11 emodži panel i istoriju privremene memorije.

segment.source: For web browsers, there are fixes for reporting error messages, figures, captions, table labels and checkbox/radio button menu items.
segment.target: Za Web pretraživače, ispravljeno je prijavljivanje poruka sa greškama, figura, naslova slika, oznaka tabela i stavki menija izbornih polja i radio dugmadi.

segment.source: LibLouis has been updated, adding new Braille tables for Cyrillic Serbian, Yiddish, several ancient languages, Turkish, and the International Phonetic Alphabet.
segment.target: Liblouis je ažuriran, dodajući nove brajeve tabele za srpsku ćirilicu, jidiš, nekoliko drevnih jezika, turski i Međunarodni fonetski alfabet.

segment.source: eSpeak has been updated, adding support for the Karakalpak language.
segment.target: eSpeak je ažuriran, dodajući podršku za Karakalpak jezik.

segment.source: Unicode CLDR has also been updated.
segment.target: Unikodna CLDR baza je takođe ažurirana.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove karakteristike

segment.source: New key commands:
segment.target: Nove komande:

segment.source: Added unassigned commands for vertical and horizontal scrolling of the mouse wheel, to enhance navigation on web pages and apps with dynamic content, such as Dism++. (#16462, @Cary-Rowen)
segment.target: Dodate komande bez dodeljene prečice za vertikalno i horizontalno pomeranje točkića miša, za poboljšanje navigacije na Web stranicama i u aplikacijama sa dinamičkim sadržajem, kao što su Dism++. (#16462, @Cary-Rowen)

segment.source: Added support for Unicode Normalization to speech and braille output. (#11570, #16466 @LeonarddeR).
segment.target: Dodata podrška za unikodnu standardizaciju govornog i brajevog izlaza. (#11570, #16466 @LeonarddeR).

segment.source: This can be useful when reading characters that are unknown to a particular speech synthesizer or braille table and which have a compatible alternative, like the bold and italic characters commonly used on social media.
segment.target: Ovo može biti korisno kada se čitaju znakovi koji su nepoznati određenom sintetizatoru govora ili brajevoj tabeli a koji imaju kompatibilnu alternativu, kao što su podebljani i iskošeni znakovi koji se često koriste na društvenim mrežama.

segment.source: It also allows reading of equations in the Microsoft Word equation editor. (#4631)
segment.target: Takođe dozvoljava čitanje matematičkih zadataka u Microsoft Word uređivaču zadataka. (#4631)

segment.source: You can enable this functionality for both speech and braille in their respective settings categories in the NVDA Settings dialog.
segment.target: Možete omogućiti ovu funkciju za govor i brajeve redove u odgovarajućim kategorijama podešavanja u NVDA dijalogu podešavanja.

segment.source: By default, after NVDA startup, you will be notified if any add-on updates are available. (#15035)
segment.target: Po podrazumevanim podešavanjima, nakon što se NVDA pokrene, dobićete obaveštenje ako su dostupna ažuriranja za vaše dodatke. (#15035)

segment.source: This can be disabled in the "Add-on Store" category of settings.
segment.target: Ovo se može onemogućiti u kategoriji "Prodavnica dodataka" NVDA podešavanja.

segment.source: NVDA checks daily for add-on updates.
segment.target: NVDA dnevno proverava ažuriranja za dodatke.

segment.source: Only updates within the same channel will be checked (e.g. installed beta add-ons will only notify for updates in the beta channel).
segment.target: Proveravaće se samo ažuriranja na istom kanalu (na primer instalirani beta dodaci će obaveštavati samo kada postoje ažuriranja na beta kanalu).

segment.source: Added support for the Help Tech Activator Pro displays. (#16668)
segment.target: Dodata podrška za Help Tech Activator Pro redove. (#16668)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promene

segment.source: Component updates:
segment.target: Ažurirane komponente:

segment.source: eSpeak NG has been updated to 1.52-dev commit `54ee11a79`. (#16495)
segment.target: eSpeak NG je ažuriran na 1.52-dev commit `54ee11a79`. (#16495)

segment.source: Added new language Karakalpak.
segment.target: Dodat novi jjezik Karakalpak.

segment.source: Updated Unicode CLDR to version 45.0. (#16507, @OzancanKaratas)
segment.target: Ažurirana Unicode CLDR baza na verziju 45.0. (#16507, @OzancanKaratas)

segment.source: Updated fast_diff_match_patch (used to detect changes in terminals and other dynamic content) to version 2.1.0. (#16508, @codeofdusk)
segment.target: Ažuriran fast_diff_match_patch (koristi se za prepoznavanje promena u terminalima i drugom dinamičkom sadržaju) na verziju 2.1.0. (#16508, @codeofdusk)

segment.source: Updated LibLouis braille translator to [3.30.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.30.0). (#16652, @codeofdusk)
segment.target: Ažuriran LibLouis brajev prevodilac na [3.30.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.30.0). (#16652, @codeofdusk)

segment.source: New braille tables:
segment.target: Nove brajeve tabele:

segment.source: Cyrillic Serbian.
segment.target: Srpski ćirilica.

segment.source: Yiddish.
segment.target: Jidiš.

segment.source: Several ancient languages: Biblical Hebrew, Akkadian, Syriac, Ugaritic and transliterated Cuneiform text.
segment.target: Nekoliko drevnih jezika: Biblijski hebrejski, akadski, sirijski, ugarit i transliterovan sumerski.

segment.source: Turkish grade 2. (#16735)
segment.target: Turski stepen 2. (#16735)

segment.source: International Phonetic Alphabet. (#16773)
segment.target: Međunarodni fonetski alfabet. (#16773)

segment.source: Updated NSIS to 3.10 (#16674, @dpy013)
segment.target: Ažuriran NSIS na 3.10 (#16674, @dpy013)

segment.source: Updated markdown to 3.6 (#16725, @dpy013)
segment.target: Ažuriran markdown na 3.6 (#16725, @dpy013)

segment.source: Updated nh3 to 0.2.17 (#16725, @dpy013)
segment.target: Ažuriran nh3 na 0.2.17 (#16725, @dpy013)

segment.source: The fallback braille input table is now equal to the fallback output table, which is Unified English Braille Code grade 1. (#9863, @JulienCochuyt, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Ulazna brajeva tabela na koju se NVDA vraća je sada ista kao i izlazna tabela, a to je unificirani engleski brajev kod stepen 1. (#9863, @JulienCochuyt, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: NVDA will now report figures with no accessible children, but with a label or description. (#14514)
segment.target: NVDA će sada prijaviti figure bez pristupačnih unutrašnjih elemenata, ali koje imaju oznaku ili opis. (#14514)

segment.source: When reading by line in browse mode, "caption" is no longer reported on each line of a long figure or table caption. (#14874)
segment.target: Kada čitate red po red u režimu pretraživanja, "Naslov slike" se više neće prijavljivati na svakom redu dugog naslova figure ili tabele. (#14874)

segment.source: In the Python console, the last unexecuted command will no longer be lost when moving in the input history. (#16653, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: U Python konzoli, poslednja neizvršena komanda više neće biti izgubljena kada se krećete kroz istoriju unosa. (#16653, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: A unique anonymous ID is now sent as part of optional NVDA usage statistics gathering. (#16266)
segment.target: Jedinstveni anonimni ID se sada šalje kao deo opcionog prikupljanja NVDA statistika korišćenja. (#16266)

segment.source: By default, a new folder will be created when making a portable copy.
segment.target: Po podrazumevanim podešavanjima, novi folder će biti napravljen kada se pravi prenosna kopija.

segment.source: A warning message will inform you if you try writing to a non-empty directory. (#16686)
segment.target: Upozorenje će vas informisati kada se pravi u folderu koji nije prazan. (#16686)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravljene greške

segment.source: Windows 11 fixes:
segment.target: Windows 11 ispravke:

segment.source: NVDA will no longer appear to get stuck when closing the clipboard history and emoji panel. (#16346, #16347, @josephsl)
segment.target: NVDA se više neće zaglavljivati kada zatvorite istoriju privremene memorije i emodži panel. (#16346, #16347, @josephsl)

segment.source: NVDA will announce visible candidates again when opening the IME interface. (#14023, @josephsl)
segment.target: NVDA će ponovo izgovarati vidljive kandidate kada se otvori Windows 11 IME interfejs. (#14023, @josephsl)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer announce "clipboard history" twice when navigating through the emoji panel menu items. (#16532, @josephsl)
segment.target: NVDA više neće izgovarati "Istorija privremene memorije" dva puta kada se krećete kroz stavke menija emodži panela. (#16532, @josephsl)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer cut off speech and braille when reviewing kaomojis and symbols in the emoji panel. (#16533, @josephsl)
segment.target: NVDA više neće prekidati govor i brajev izlaz kada pregledate kaomodžije i simbole u emodži panelu. (#16533, @josephsl)

segment.source: Web browser fixes:
segment.target: Ispravke za Web pretraživače:

segment.source: Error messages referenced with `aria-errormessage` are now reported in Google Chrome and Mozilla Firefox. (#8318)
segment.target: Poruke greške označene uz `aria-errormessage` se sada prijavljuju u pretraživačima Google Chrome i Mozilla Firefox. (#8318)

segment.source: If present, NVDA will now use `aria-labelledby` to provide accessible names for tables in Mozilla Firefox. (#5183)
segment.target: Ako postoji, NVDA će sada koristiti `aria-labelledby` da bi pružio pristupačna imena za tabele u pretraživaču Mozilla Firefox. (#5183)

segment.source: NVDA will correctly announce radio and checkbox menu items when first entering sub-menus in Google Chrome and Mozilla Firefox. (#14550)
segment.target: NVDA će ispravno izgovarati radio i izborna polja kao stavke menija kada se prvi put uđe u podmenije u pretraživačima Google Chrome i Mozilla Firefox. (#14550)

segment.source: NVDA's browse mode find functionality is now more accurate when the page contains emojis. (#16317, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: NVDA pretraga u režimu pretraživanja je sada preciznija kada stranica sadrži emodžije. (#16317, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox, NVDA now correctly reports the current character, word and line when the cursor is at the insertion point at the end of a line. (#3156, @jcsteh)
segment.target: U programu Mozilla Firefox, NVDA sada ispravno prijavljuje trenutni znak, reč i red kada je kursor na kraju reda. (#3156, @jcsteh)

segment.source: No longer cause Google Chrome to crash when closing a document or exiting Chrome. (#16893)
segment.target: NVDA više ne izaziva da se Google Chrome ruši kada se zatvori dokument ili izađe iz programa Chrome. (#16893)

segment.source: NVDA will announce correctly the autocomplete suggestions in Eclipse and other Eclipse-based environments on Windows 11. (#16416, @thgcode)
segment.target: NVDA će ispravno izgovarati predloge automatskog dopunjavanja u programu Eclipse i drugim Eclipse zasnovanim okruženjima na Windowsu 11. (#16416, @thgcode)

segment.source: Improved reliability of automatic text readout, particularly in terminal applications. (#15850, #16027, @Danstiv)
segment.target: Poboljšana pouzdanost automatskog čitanja teksta, posebno u terminal aplikacijama. (#15850, #16027, @Danstiv)

segment.source: It is once again possible to reset the configuration to factory defaults reliably. (#16755, @Emil-18)
segment.target: Ponovo je moguće pouzdano vratiti podešavanja na fabričke vrednosti. (#16755, @Emil-18)

segment.source: NVDA will correctly announce selection changes when editing a cell's text in Microsoft Excel. (#15843)
segment.target: NVDA će ispravno izgovarati promene izbora kada se uređuje tekst ćelije u Microsoft Excelu. (#15843)

segment.source: In applications using Java Access Bridge, NVDA will now correctly read the last blank line of a text instead of repeating the previous line. (#9376, @dmitrii-drobotov)
segment.target: u aplikacijama koje koriste Java Access Bridge, NVDA će sada ispravno pročitati poslednji prazan red teksta umesto da ponovi prethodni red. (#9376, @dmitrii-drobotov)

segment.source: In LibreOffice Writer (version 24.8 and newer), when toggling text formatting (bold, italic, underline, subscript/superscript, alignment) using the corresponding keyboard shortcut, NVDA announces the new formatting attribute (e.g. "Bold on", "Bold off"). (#4248, @michaelweghorn)
segment.target: U LibreOffice Writeru (verzija 24.8 i novije), kada se menja formatiranje teksta (podebljano, iskošeno, podvučeno, indeksi/eksponenti, poravnavanje) korišćenjem odgovarajućih prečica na tastaturi, NVDA izgovara novi atribut formatiranja (na primer "Podebljano uključeno", "Podebljano isključeno"). (#4248, @michaelweghorn)

segment.source: When navigating with the cursor keys in text boxes in applications which use UI Automation, NVDA no longer sometimes reports the wrong character, word, etc. (#16711, @jcsteh)
segment.target: Kada se krećete kursorskim tasterima po tekstualnim poljima u aplikacijama koje koriste UI Automation, NVDA više neće ponekad prijavljivati pogrešan znak, reč, i tako dalje. (#16711, @jcsteh)

segment.source: When pasting into the Windows 10/11 Calculator, NVDA now correctly reports the full number pasted. (#16573, @TristanBurchett)
segment.target: Kada nalepite tekst u Windows 10/11 Kalkulator, NVDA sada ispravno prijavljuje celi broj koji je nalepljen. (#16573, @TristanBurchett)

segment.source: Speech is no longer silent after disconnecting from and reconnecting to a Remote Desktop session. (#16722, @jcsteh)
segment.target: Govor se više ne gubi nakon što prekinete vezu ili se ponovo povežete na sesiju sa udaljenim računarom. (#16722, @jcsteh)

segment.source: Support added for text review commands for an object's name in Visual Studio Code. (#16248, @Cary-Rowen)
segment.target: Dodata podrška za komande pregleda teksta za ime objekta u programu Visual Studio Code. (#16248, @Cary-Rowen)

segment.source: Playing NVDA sounds no longer fails on a mono audio device. (#16770, @jcsteh)
segment.target: Reprodukovanje NVDA zvukova više neće biti neuspešno na mono audio uređaju. (#16770, @jcsteh)

segment.source: NVDA will report addresses when arrowing through To/CC/BCC fields in outlook.com / Modern Outlook. (#16856)
segment.target: NVDA će prijaviti adrese kada se strelicama krećete kroz polja za upisivanje primaoca/CC/BCC na sajtu outlook.com ili u modernoj Outlook aplikaciji. (#16856)

segment.source: NVDA now handles add-on installation failures more gracefully. (#16704)
segment.target: NVDA sada bolje obrađuje greške prilikom instalacije dodataka. (#16704)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promene za programere (engleski)

segment.source: NVDA now uses Ruff instead of flake8 for linting. (#14817)
segment.target: NVDA now uses Ruff instead of flake8 for linting. (#14817)

segment.source: Fixed NVDA's build system to work properly when using Visual Studio 2022 version 17.10 and above. (#16480, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Fixed NVDA's build system to work properly when using Visual Studio 2022 version 17.10 and above. (#16480, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: A fixed width font is now used in Log Viewer and in the NVDA Python Console so that the cursor remains in the same column during vertical navigation.
segment.target: A fixed width font is now used in Log Viewer and in the NVDA Python Console so that the cursor remains in the same column during vertical navigation.

segment.source: It is especially useful to read the error location markers in tracebacks. (#16321, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: It is especially useful to read the error location markers in tracebacks. (#16321, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: Support for custom braille tables has been added. (#3304, #16208, @JulienCochuyt, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Support for custom braille tables has been added. (#3304, #16208, @JulienCochuyt, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Tables can be provided in the `brailleTables` folder in an add-on package.
segment.target: Tables can be provided in the `brailleTables` folder in an add-on package.

segment.source: Table metadata can be added to an optional `brailleTables` section in the add-on manifest or to a `.ini` file with the same format found in the brailleTables subdirectory of the scratchpad directory.
segment.target: Table metadata can be added to an optional `brailleTables` section in the add-on manifest or to a `.ini` file with the same format found in the brailleTables subdirectory of the scratchpad directory.

segment.source: Please consult the [braille translation tables section in the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#BrailleTables) for more details.
segment.target: Please consult the [braille translation tables section in the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#BrailleTables) for more details.

segment.source: When a `gainFocus` event is queued with an object that has a valid `focusRedirect` property, the object pointed to by the `focusRedirect` property is now held by `eventHandler.lastQueuedFocusObject`, rather than the originally queued object. (#15843)
segment.target: When a `gainFocus` event is queued with an object that has a valid `focusRedirect` property, the object pointed to by the `focusRedirect` property is now held by `eventHandler.lastQueuedFocusObject`, rather than the originally queued object. (#15843)

segment.source: NVDA will log its executable architecture (x86) at startup. (#16432, @josephsl)
segment.target: NVDA will log its executable architecture (x86) at startup. (#16432, @josephsl)

segment.source: `wx.CallAfter`, which is wrapped in `monkeyPatches/wxMonkeyPatches.py`, now includes proper `functools.wraps` indication. (#16520, @XLTechie)
segment.target: `wx.CallAfter`, which is wrapped in `monkeyPatches/wxMonkeyPatches.py`, now includes proper `functools.wraps` indication. (#16520, @XLTechie)

segment.source: There is a new module for scheduling tasks `utils.schedule`, using the pip module `schedule`. (#16636)
segment.target: There is a new module for scheduling tasks `utils.schedule`, using the pip module `schedule`. (#16636)

segment.source: You can use `scheduleThread.scheduleDailyJobAtStartUp` to automatically schedule a job that happens after NVDA starts, and every 24 hours after that.
segment.target: You can use `scheduleThread.scheduleDailyJobAtStartUp` to automatically schedule a job that happens after NVDA starts, and every 24 hours after that.

segment.source: Jobs are scheduled with a delay to avoid conflicts.
segment.target: Jobs are scheduled with a delay to avoid conflicts.

segment.source: `scheduleThread.scheduleDailyJob` and `scheduleJob` can be used to schedule jobs at custom times, where a `JobClashError` will be raised on a known job scheduling clash.
segment.target: `scheduleThread.scheduleDailyJob` and `scheduleJob` can be used to schedule jobs at custom times, where a `JobClashError` will be raised on a known job scheduling clash.

segment.source: It is now possible to create app modules for apps hosting Edge WebView2 (msedgewebview2.exe) controls. (#16705, @josephsl)
segment.target: It is now possible to create app modules for apps hosting Edge WebView2 (msedgewebview2.exe) controls. (#16705, @josephsl)

segment.source: There is a new feature called sound split.
segment.target: Dodata je nova opcija razdvajanje zvuka.

segment.source: This allows splitting NVDA sounds into one channel (e.g. left) while sounds from all other applications are directed to the other channel (e.g. right).
segment.target: Ovo vam dozvoljava da odvojite NVDA na jednom kanalu (na primer levom) a zvukove svih ostalih aplikacija prebacite na drugi (na primer desni).

segment.source: There are new commands for modifying the synth settings ring, allowing users to jump to the first or last setting, and to increase or decrease the current setting in larger steps.
segment.target: Dodate su nove komande za menjanje vrednosti u krugu podešavanja govora, koje dozvoljavaju korisnicima da skoče na prvo ili poslednje podešavanje, ili da povećaju ili smanje trenutno podešavanje većim skokom.

segment.source: There are also new quick navigation commands, allowing users to bind gestures to quickly jump between: paragraph, vertically aligned paragraph, same style text, different style text, menu item, toggle button, progress bar, figure, and math formula.
segment.target: Dodate su takođe nove komande brze navigacije, one dozvoljavaju korisnicima da dodaju prečice kako bi brzo skakali između: Pasusa, vertikalno poravnatih pasusa, teksta istog stila, teksta različitog stila, stavki menija, dugmadi prekidača, traka napredovanja, figura i matematičkih formula.

segment.source: There are many new braille features and bug fixes.
segment.target: Dodate su brojne nove karakteristike za brajeve redove i ispravljene greške.

segment.source: A new braille mode called "display speech output" has been added.
segment.target: Dodat je novi brajev režim "Prikaži govor".

segment.source: When active, the braille display shows exactly what NVDA speaks.
segment.target: Kada je aktivan, brajev red će prikazati tačno ono što NVDA izgovara.

segment.source: Support was also added for the BrailleEdgeS2 and BrailleEdgeS3 displays.
segment.target: Takođe je dodata podrška za BrailleEdgeS2 i BrailleEdgeS3 brajeve uređaje.

segment.source: LibLouis was updated, adding new detailed (with capital letters indicated) Belarusian and Ukrainian Braille tables, a Lao table, and a Spanish table for reading Greek texts.
segment.target: LibLouis je ažuriran, dodajući nove detaljne (uz indikaciju velikih slova) beloruske i ukrajinske brajeve tabele, lao tabelu i špansku tabelu za čitanje grčkih tekstova.

segment.source: eSpeak was updated, adding new language Tigrinya.
segment.target: eSpeak je ažuriran, dodajući novi tigrinjski jezik.

segment.source: There are many minor bug fixes for applications, such as Thunderbird, Adobe Reader, web browsers, Nudi and Geekbench.
segment.target: Postoje brojne ispravke za sitne greške u aplikacijama, kao što su Thunderbird, Adobe Reader, Web pretraživači, Nudi i Geekbench.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove karakteristike

segment.source: New key commands:
segment.target: Nove prečice:

segment.source: New Quick Navigation command `p` for jumping to next/previous text paragraph in browse mode. (#15998, @mltony)
segment.target: Nova komanda brze navigacije `p` za skakanje na sledeći ili prethodni pasus teksta u režimu pretraživanja. (#15998, @mltony)

segment.source: New unassigned Quick Navigation commands, which can be used to jump to the next/previous:
segment.target: Nove komande brze navigacije bez dodeljene prečice, koje se mogu koristiti za skakanje na sledeće ili prethodne:

segment.source: figure (#10826)
segment.target: Figure (#10826)

segment.source: vertically aligned paragraph (#15999, @mltony)
segment.target: Vertikalno poravnate pasuse (#15999, @mltony)

segment.source: menu item (#16001, @mltony)
segment.target: Stavke menija (#16001, @mltony)

segment.source: toggle button (#16001, @mltony)
segment.target: Dugmadi prekidača (#16001, @mltony)

segment.source: progress bar (#16001, @mltony)
segment.target: Trake napredovanja (#16001, @mltony)

segment.source: math formula (#16001, @mltony)
segment.target: Matematičke formule (#16001, @mltony)

segment.source: same style text (#16000, @mltony)
segment.target: Tekst istog stila (#16000, @mltony)

segment.source: different style text (#16000, @mltony)
segment.target: Tekst različitog stila (#16000, @mltony)

segment.source: Added commands to jump first, last, forward and backward through the synth settings ring. (#13768, #16095, @rmcpantoja)
segment.target: Dodate komande za skakanje na prvu ili poslednju vrednost, ili za veći skok pri menjanju podešavanja u krugu podešavanja govora. (#13768, #16095, @rmcpantoja)

segment.source: Setting the first/last setting in the synth settings ring has no assigned gesture. (#13768)
segment.target: Podešavanje prve ili poslednje vrednosti u krugu podešavanja govora nema dodeljenu prečicu. (#13768)

segment.source: Decrease and increase the current setting of the synth settings ring in a larger step (#13768):
segment.target: Smanji ili povećaj trenutno podešavanje u krugu podešavanja govora većim skokom (#13768):

segment.source: Desktop: `NVDA+control+pageUp` and `NVDA+control+pageDown`.
segment.target: Desktop: `NVDA+kontrol+pageUp` ili `NVDA+kontrol+pageDown`.

segment.source: Laptop: `NVDA+control+shift+pageUp` and `NVDA+control+shift+pageDown`.
segment.target: Laptop: `NVDA+kontrol+šift+pageUp` ili `NVDA+kontrol+šift+pageDown`.

segment.source: Added a new unassigned input gesture to toggle the reporting of figures and captions. (#10826, #14349)
segment.target: Dodata nova komanda bez dodeljene prečice za uključivanje ili isključivanje prijavljivanja figura i naslova slika. (#10826, #14349)

segment.source: Braille:
segment.target: Brajevi redovi:

segment.source: Added support for the BrailleEdgeS2 and BrailleEdgeS3 displays. (#16033, #16279, @EdKweon)
segment.target: Dodata podrška za BrailleEdgeS2 i BrailleEdgeS3 brajeve redove. (#16033, #16279, @EdKweon)

segment.source: A new braille mode called "display speech output" has been added. (#15898, @Emil-18)
segment.target: Dodat je novi brajev režim "Prikaži govor". (#15898, @Emil-18)

segment.source: When active, the braille display shows exactly what NVDA speaks.
segment.target: Kada je aktivan, na brajevom redu će se prikazati ono što NVDA izgovara.

segment.source: It can be toggled by pressing `NVDA+alt+t`, or from the braille settings dialog.
segment.target: Može se uključiti ili isključiti prečicom `NVDA+alt+t`, ili iz dijaloga brajevih podešavanja.

segment.source: Sound split: (#12985, @mltony)
segment.target: Razdvajanje zvuka: (#12985, @mltony)

segment.source: Allows splitting NVDA sounds into one channel (e.g. left) while sounds from all other applications are directed to the other channel (e.g. right).
segment.target: Dozvoljava da odvojite NVDA zvukove na jednom kanalu (na primer levom) dok su zvukovi drugih aplikacija na drugom kanalu (na primer desnom).

segment.source: Toggled by `NVDA+alt+s`.
segment.target: Uključuje se ili isključuje prečicom `NVDA+alt+s`.

segment.source: Reporting row and column headers is now supported in contenteditable HTML elements. (#14113)
segment.target: Prijavljivanje zaglavlja redova i kolona je sada podržano u contenteditable HTML elementima. (#14113)

segment.source: Added an option to disable the reporting of figures and captions in Document Formatting settings. (#10826, #14349)
segment.target: Dodata opcija kako biste onemogućili prijavljivanje figura i naslova slika u podešavanjima formatiranja dokumenta. (#10826, #14349)

segment.source: In Windows 11, NVDA will announce alerts from voice typing and suggested actions including the top suggestion when copying data such as phone numbers to the clipboard (Windows 11 2022 Update and later). (#16009, @josephsl)
segment.target: U Windowsu 11, NVDA će izgovarati upozorenja glasovnog unosa i predloženih radnji uključujući predlog na vrhu kada kopirate podatke kao što su brojevi telefona u privremenu memoriju (Windows 11 2022 ažuriranje i novija). (#16009, @josephsl)

segment.source: NVDA will keep the audio device awake after speech stops, in order to prevent the start of the next speech being clipped with some audio devices such as Bluetooth headphones. (#14386, @jcsteh, @mltony)
segment.target: NVDA će održavati zvučni uređaj budnim nakon što se govor zaustavi, kako bi sprečio da početak sledećeg izgovorenog teksta bude isprekidan sa nekim zvučnim uređajima kao što su Bluetooth slušalice. (#14386, @jcsteh, @mltony)

segment.source: HP Secure Browser is now supported. (#16377)
segment.target: HP Secure pretraživač je sada podržan. (#16377)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promene

segment.source: Add-on Store:
segment.target: Prodavnica dodataka:

segment.source: The minimum and the last tested NVDA version for an add-on are now displayed in the "other details" area. (#15776, @Nael-Sayegh)
segment.target: Minimalna i poslednja testirana NVDA verzija za dodatak se sada prikazuju u sekciji "Drugi detalji". (#15776, @Nael-Sayegh)

segment.source: The community reviews action will be available in all tabs of the store. (#16179, @nvdaes)
segment.target: Radnja za recenzije zajednice će biti dostupna na svim karticama prodavnice. (#16179, @nvdaes)

segment.source: Component updates:
segment.target: Ažurirane komponente:

segment.source: Updated LibLouis Braille translator to [3.29.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.29.0). (#16259, @codeofdusk)
segment.target: Ažuriran LibLouis brajev prevodilac na [3.29.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.29.0). (#16259, @codeofdusk)

segment.source: New detailed (with capital letters indicated) Belarusian and Ukrainian Braille tables.
segment.target: Nove detaljne (uz indikaciju velikih slova) beloruske i ukrajinske brajeve tabele.

segment.source: New Spanish table for reading Greek texts.
segment.target: Nova španska tabela za čitanje grčkih tekstova.

segment.source: New table for Lao Grade 1. (#16470)
segment.target: Nova tabela za lao stepen 1. (#16470)

segment.source: eSpeak NG has been updated to 1.52-dev commit `cb62d93fd7`. (#15913)
segment.target: eSpeak NG je ažuriran na 1.52-dev commit `cb62d93fd7`. (#15913)

segment.source: Added new language Tigrinya.
segment.target: Dodat novi tigrinjski jezik.

segment.source: Changed several gestures for BrailleSense devices to avoid conflicts with characters of the French braille table. (#15306)
segment.target: Promenjeno nekoliko prečica za BrailleSense uređaje kako bi se sprečili konflikti sa znakovima francuske brajeve tabele. (#15306)

segment.source: `alt+leftArrow` is now mapped to `dot2+dot7+space`
segment.target: `alt+strelicaLevo` je sada `tačka2+tačka7+razmak`

segment.source: `alt+rightArrow` is now mapped to `dot5+dot7+space`
segment.target: `alt+strelicaDesno` je sada `tačka5+tačka7+razmak`

segment.source: `alt+upArrow` is now mapped to `dot2+dot3+dot7+space`
segment.target: `alt+strelicaGore` je sada `tačka2+tačka3+tačka7+razmak`

segment.source: `alt+downArrow` is now mapped to `dot5+dot6+dot7+space`
segment.target: `alt+strelicaDole` je sada `tačka5+tačka6+tačka7+razmak`

segment.source: Padding dots commonly used in tables of contents are not reported anymore at low punctuation levels. (#15845, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Nizovi tačaka koji se često koriste u sadržaju teksta se više ne prijavljuju na nivoima izgovora manje interpunkcije. (#15845, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravljene greške

segment.source: Windows 11 fixes:
segment.target: Windows 11 ispravke:

segment.source: NVDA will once again announce hardware keyboard input suggestions. (#16283, @josephsl)
segment.target: NVDA će ponovo izgovarati predloge za unos sa hardverske tastature. (#16283, @josephsl)

segment.source: In Version 24H2 (2024 Update and Windows Server 2025), mouse and touch interaction can be used in quick settings. (#16348, @josephsl)
segment.target: U verziji 24H2 (2024 ažuriranje i Windows Server 2025), interakcija mišem ili ekranom osetljivim na dodir se može koristiti u brzim podešavanjima. (#16348, @josephsl)

segment.source: Add-on Store:
segment.target: Prodavnica dodataka:

segment.source: When pressing `ctrl+tab`, focus properly moves to the new current tab title. (#14986, @ABuffEr)
segment.target: Kada pritisnete `ctrl+tab`, fokus se ispravno prebacuje na novi naziv trenutne kartice. (#14986, @ABuffEr)

segment.source: If cache files are not correct, NVDA no longer will restart. (#16362, @nvdaes)
segment.target: Ako datoteke keša nisu ispravne, NVDA se neće neprekidno restartovati. (#16362, @nvdaes)

segment.source: Fixes for Chromium-based browsers when used with UIA:
segment.target: Ispravke za pretraživače zasnovane na Chromiumu kada se koriste uz UIA:

segment.source: Fixed bugs causing NVDA to hang. (#16393, #16394)
segment.target: Ispravljene greške koje su izazvale da se NVDA zamrzne. (#16393, #16394)

segment.source: Backspace key is now working correctly in Gmail sign-in fields. (#16395)
segment.target: Backspace taster sada ispravno radi u Gmail poljima za prijavljivanje. (#16395)

segment.source: Backspace now works correctly when using Nudi 6.1 with NVDA's "Handle keys from other applications" setting enabled. (#15822, @jcsteh)
segment.target: Taster Backspace sada ispravno radi kada koristite Nudi 6.1 uz omogućeno NVDA podešavanje "Kontroliši tastere iz drugih aplikacija". (#15822, @jcsteh)

segment.source: Fixed a bug where audio coordinates would be played while the application is in sleep mode when "Play audio coordinates when mouse moves" is enabled. (#8059, @hwf1324)
segment.target: Ispravljena greška koja je izazivala da se zvučni koordinati reprodukuju dok je aplikacija u režimu spavanja kada je omogućeno podešavanje "Reprodukuj zvučne koordinate kada se miš pomera". (#8059, @hwf1324)

segment.source: In Adobe Reader, NVDA no longer ignores alternative text set on formulas in PDFs. (#12715)
segment.target: U Adobe Readeru, NVDA više ne ignoriše alternativni tekst koji je podešen za formule u PDF datotekama. (#12715)

segment.source: Fixed a bug causing NVDA to fail to read the ribbon and options within Geekbench. (#16251, @mzanm)
segment.target: Ispravljena greška koja je izazvala da NVDA ne može da pročita traku menija i opcije u programu Geekbench. (#16251, @mzanm)

segment.source: Fixed a rare case when saving the configuration may fail to save all profiles. (#16343, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Ispravljena retka situacija u kojoj čuvanje podešavanja ne uspe da sačuva sve profile. (#16343, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: In Firefox and Chromium-based browsers, NVDA will correctly enter focus mode when pressing enter when positioned within a presentational list (ul / ol) inside editable content. (#16325)
segment.target: U Firefoxu i pretraživačima zasnovanim na Chromiumu, NVDA će ispravno ući u režim fokusiranja kada se pritisne enter u prezentacionoj listi (ul / ol) u sadržaju koji se može uređivati. (#16325)

segment.source: Column state change is now correctly reported when selecting columns to display in Thunderbird message list. (#16323)
segment.target: Promena stanja kolona se ispravno prijavljuje kada se biraju kolone za prikazivanje u listi poruka programa Thunderbird. (#16323)

segment.source: The command line switch `-h`/`--help` works properly again. (#16522, @XLTechie)
segment.target: Opcija komandne linije `-h`/`--help` ponovo ispravno radi. (#16522, @XLTechie)

segment.source: NVDA's support for the Poedit translation software version 3.4 or higher correctly functions when translating languages with 1 or more than 2 plural forms (e.g. Chinese, Polish). (#16318)
segment.target: NVDA podrška za Poedit program za prevođenje u verziji 3.4 ili novijim ispravno funkcioniše kada se prevodi na jezike koji imaju jednu ili više od dve množine (na primer kineski, poljski, srpski). (#16318)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promene za programere (engleski)

segment.source: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.
segment.target: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.

segment.source: Instantiating `winVersion.WinVersion` objects with unknown Windows versions above 10.0.22000 such as 10.0.25398 returns "Windows 11 unknown" instead of "Windows 10 unknown" for release name. (#15992, @josephsl)
segment.target: Instantiating `winVersion.WinVersion` objects with unknown Windows versions above 10.0.22000 such as 10.0.25398 returns "Windows 11 unknown" instead of "Windows 10 unknown" for release name. (#15992, @josephsl)

segment.source: Make the AppVeyor build process easier for NVDA forks, by adding configurable variables in appveyor.yml to disable or modify NV Access specific portions of the build scripts. (#16216, @XLTechie)
segment.target: Make the AppVeyor build process easier for NVDA forks, by adding configurable variables in appveyor.yml to disable or modify NV Access specific portions of the build scripts. (#16216, @XLTechie)

segment.source: Added a how-to document, explaining the process of building NVDA forks on AppVeyor. (#16293, @XLTechie)
segment.target: Added a how-to document, explaining the process of building NVDA forks on AppVeyor. (#16293, @XLTechie)

segment.source: A new "on-demand" speech mode has been added.
segment.target: Dodat je novi režim govora "Na zahtev".

segment.source: When speech is on-demand, NVDA does not speak automatically (e.g. when moving the cursor) but still speaks when calling commands whose goal is explicitly to report something (e.g. report window title).
segment.target: Kada je govor podešen na zahtev, NVDA ne govori automatski (na primer pri pomeranju kursora) ali govori kada se koriste komande koje imaju za cilj da nešto prijave (na primer komanda za prijavljivanje naslova prozora).

segment.source: In the Speech category of NVDA's settings, it is now possible to exclude unwanted speech modes from the Cycle speech modes command (`NVDA+s`).
segment.target: U kategoriji govor NVDA podešavanja, sada je moguće izuzeti neželjene režime govora iz komande koja kruži kroz režime govora (`NVDA+s`).

segment.source: A new Native Selection mode (toggled by `NVDA+shift+f10`) is now available in NVDA's browse mode for Mozilla Firefox.
segment.target: U NVDA režimu pretraživanja programa Mozilla Firefox Dostupan je novi režim ugrađenog izbora (uključuje se i isključuje prečicom `NVDA+šift+f10`).

segment.source: When turned on, selecting text in browse mode will also manipulate Firefox's own native selection.
segment.target: Kada se uključi, izbor teksta u režimu pretraživanja će takođe menjati izbor teksta ugrađen u program Mozilla Firefox.

segment.source: Copying text with `control+c` will pass straight through to Firefox, thus copying the rich content, rather than NVDA's plain text representation.
segment.target: Kopiranje teksta prečicom `kontrol+c` će se proslediti u Firefox, što će kopirati formatiranje sadržaja, a ne običan tekst koji NVDA prikazuje.

segment.source: The Add-on Store now supports bulk actions (e.g. installing, enabling add-ons) by selecting multiple add-ons
segment.target: Prodavnica dodataka sada podržava istovremene radnje za više dodataka (na primer instalacija, omogućavanje dodataka) tako što izaberete više dodataka

segment.source: There is a new action to open a reviews webpage for the selected add-on.
segment.target: Dodata je nova radnja za otvaranje Web stranice sa recenzijama za izabrani dodatak.

segment.source: The audio output device and ducking mode options have been removed from the "Select Synthesizer" dialog.
segment.target: Opcije za izbor izlaznog uređaja reprodukcije zvukova i režima stišavanja pozadinskih zvukova su uklonjene iz dijaloga "Izaberi sintetizator".

segment.source: They can be found in the audio settings panel which can be opened with `NVDA+control+u`.
segment.target: Ove opcije se mogu pronaći u panelu podešavanja zvuka koji se može otvoriti prečicom `NVDA+kontrol+u`.

segment.source: eSpeak-NG, LibLouis braille translator, and Unicode CLDR have been updated.
segment.target: eSpeak-NG, LibLouis brajev prevodilac i Unicode CLDR su ažurirani.

segment.source: New Thai, Filipino and Romanian braille tables are available.
segment.target: Dostupne su nove tajlandske, filipinske i rumunske brajeve tabele.

segment.source: There are many bug fixes, particularly for the Add-on Store, braille, Libre Office, Microsoft Office and audio.
segment.target: Ispravljene su mnoge greške, posebno vezane za prodavnicu dodataka, brajeve redove, Libre Office, Microsoft Office i zvuk.

segment.source: Important notes
segment.target: Važne napomene

segment.source: This release breaks compatibility with existing add-ons.
segment.target: Postojeći dodaci nisu kompatibilni uz ovu verziju.

segment.source: Windows 7, and Windows 8 are no longer supported.
segment.target: Windows 7 i Windows 8 više nisu podržani.

segment.source: Windows 8.1 is the minimum Windows version supported.
segment.target: Windows 8.1 je minimalna podržana verzija Windowsa.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove karakteristike

segment.source: Add-on Store:
segment.target: Prodavnica dodataka:

segment.source: The Add-on Store now supports bulk actions (e.g. installing, enabling add-ons) by selecting multiple add-ons. (#15350, #15623, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Prodavnica dodataka sada podržava istovremeno izvršavanje radnji (na primer instalaciju, omogućavanje dodataka) biranjem više dodataka. (#15350, #15623, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: A new action has been added to open a dedicated webpage to see or provide feedback about the selected add-on. (#15576, @nvdaes)
segment.target: Dodata je nova radnja koja otvara Web stranicu na kojoj možete videti ili pružati povratne informacije za izabrani dodatak. (#15576, @nvdaes)

segment.source: Added support for Bluetooth Low Energy HID Braille displays. (#15470)
segment.target: Dodata podrška za Bluetooth Low Energy HID brajeve redove. (#15470)

segment.source: A new Native Selection mode (toggled by `NVDA+shift+f10`) is now available in NVDA's browse mode for Mozilla Firefox.
segment.target: U NVDA režimu pretraživanja programa Mozilla Firefox Dostupan je novi režim ugrađenog izbora (uključuje se i isključuje prečicom `NVDA+šift+f10`).

segment.source: When turned on, selecting text in browse mode will also manipulate Firefox's own native selection.
segment.target: Kada se uključi, izbor teksta u režimu pretraživanja će takođe menjati izbor teksta ugrađen u program Mozilla Firefox.

segment.source: Copying text with `control+c` will pass straight through to Firefox, thus copying the rich content, rather than NVDA's plain text representation.
segment.target: Kopiranje teksta prečicom `kontrol+c` će se proslediti u Firefox, što će kopirati formatiranje sadržaja, a ne običan tekst koji NVDA prikazuje.

segment.source: Note however that as Firefox is handling the actual copy, NVDA will not report a "copy to clipboard" message in this mode. (#15830)
segment.target: Međutim, imajte na umu da budući da će Firefox obrađivati samo kopiranje, NVDA neće prijavljivati poruku "Kopirano u privremenu memoriju" u ovom režimu. (#15830)

segment.source: When copying text in Microsoft Word with NVDA's browse mode enabled, formatting is now also included.
segment.target: Kada kopirate tekst u programu Microsoft Word uz omogućen NVDA režim pretraživanja, tekst sada uključuje formatiranje.

segment.source: A side affect of this is that NVDA will no longer report a "copy to clipboard" message when pressing `control+c` in Microsoft Word / Outlook browse mode, as the application is now handling the copy, not NVDA. (#16129)
segment.target: Kao rezultat ovoga NVDA više neće prijavljivati poruku "Kopirano u privremenu memoriju" kada se pritisne `kontrol+c` u programima Microsoft Word / Outlook u režimu pretraživanja, budući da aplikacija sada obrađuje kopiranje, ne NVDA. (#16129)

segment.source: A new "on-demand" speech mode has been added.
segment.target: Dodat je novi režim govora "Na zahtev".

segment.source: When speech is on-demand, NVDA does not speak automatically (e.g. when moving the cursor) but still speaks when calling commands whose goal is explicitly to report something (e.g. report window title). (#481, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Kada je režim govora podešen na zahtev, NVDA ne govori automatski (na primer pri pomeranju kursora) ali govori kada se koriste komande koje za cilj imaju da nešto prijave (na primer prijavi naslov prozora). (#481, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: In the Speech category of NVDA's settings, it is now possible to exclude unwanted speech modes from the Cycle speech modes command (`NVDA+s`). (#15806, @lukaszgo1)
segment.target: U kategoriji govor NVDA podešavanja, sada je moguće da izuzmete neželjene režime govora iz komande koja kruži kroz režime govora (`NVDA+s`). (#15806, @lukaszgo1)

segment.source: If you are currently using the NoBeepsSpeechMode add-on consider uninstalling it, and disabling "beeps" and "on-demand" modes in the settings.
segment.target: Ako trenutno koristite dodatak NoBeepsSpeechMode možete razmotriti njegovu deinstalaciju, a umesto toga možete onemogućiti režime "Pištanja" i "Na zahtev" u podešavanjima.

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promene

segment.source: NVDA no longer supports Windows 7 and Windows 8.
segment.target: NVDA više ne podržava Windows 7 i Windows 8.

segment.source: Windows 8.1 is the minimum Windows version supported. (#15544)
segment.target: Windows 8.1 je minimalna podržana verzija Windowsa. (#15544)

segment.source: Component updates:
segment.target: Ažurirane komponente:

segment.source: Updated LibLouis braille translator to [3.28.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.28.0). (#15435, #15876, @codeofdusk)
segment.target: Ažuriran LibLouis brajev prevodilac na [3.28.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.28.0). (#15435, #15876, @codeofdusk)

segment.source: Added new Thai, Romanian, and Filipino Braille tables.
segment.target: Dodate nove tajlandske, rumunske i filipinske brajeve tabele.

segment.source: eSpeak NG has been updated to 1.52-dev commit `530bf0abf`. (#15036)
segment.target: eSpeak NG je ažuriran na 1.52-dev commit `530bf0abf`. (#15036)

segment.source: CLDR emoji and symbol annotations has been updated to version 44.0. (#15712, @OzancanKaratas)
segment.target: CLDR definicije emoji znakova i simbola su ažurirane na verziju 44.0. (#15712, @OzancanKaratas)

segment.source: Updated Java Access Bridge to 17.0.9+8Zulu (17.46.19). (#15744)
segment.target: Ažuriran Java Access Bridge na 17.0.9+8Zulu (17.46.19). (#15744)

segment.source: Key Commands:
segment.target: Tasterske prečice:

segment.source: The following commands now support two and three presses to spell the reported information and spell with character descriptions: report selection, report clipboard text and report focused object. (#15449, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Sledeće komande sada podržavaju mogućnost pritiskanja dva ili tri puta za sricanje prijavljenih informacija i sricanje uz opise znakova: Prijavljivanje izbora, prijavljivanje teksta u privremenoj memoriji i prijavljivanje trenutno fokusiranog objekta. (#15449, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: The command to toggle the screen curtain now has a default gesture: `NVDA+control+escape`. (#10560, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Komanda za uključivanje ili isključivanje zatamnjivanja ekrana sada ima podrazumevanu prečicu: `NVDA+kontrol+escape`. (#10560, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: When pressed four times, the report selection command now shows the selection in a browsable message. (#15858, @Emil-18)
segment.target: Kada se pritisne četiri puta, komanda za prijavljivanje izbora sada prikazuje izbor u poruci režima pretraživanja. (#15858, @Emil-18)

segment.source: Microsoft Office:
segment.target: Microsoft Office:

segment.source: When requesting formatting information on Excel cells, borders and background will only be reported if there is such formatting. (#15560, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Kada se zahtevaju informacije o formatiranju Excel ćelija, granice i pozadina će se prijavljivati samo ako postoji takvo formatiranje. (#15560, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: NVDA will again no longer report unlabelled groupings such as in recent versions of Microsoft Office 365 menus. (#15638)
segment.target: NVDA ponovo neće više prijavljivati grupisanja bez oznake kakva se mogu pronaći u najnovijim verzijama Microsoft Office 365 menija. (#15638)

segment.source: The audio output device and ducking mode options have been removed from the "Select Synthesizer" dialog.
segment.target: Opcije za izlazni uređaj reprodukcije zvukova i režim stišavanja pozadinskih zvukova su uklonjene iz dijaloga "Izaberi sintetizator".

segment.source: They can be found in the audio settings panel which can be opened with `NVDA+control+u`. (#15512, @codeofdusk)
segment.target: Mogu se pronaći u panelu podešavanja zvuka koji se može otvoriti prečicom `NVDA+kontrol+u`. (#15512, @codeofdusk)

segment.source: The option "Report role when mouse enters object" in NVDA's mouse settings category has been renamed to "Report object when mouse enters it".
segment.target: Opcija "Prijavi funkciju kada miš uđe u objekat" u NVDA podešavanjima miša je preimenovana u "Prijavi objekat kada miš uđe u njega".

segment.source: This option now announces additional relevant information about an object when the mouse enters it, such as states (checked/pressed) or cell coordinates in a table. (#15420, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Ova opcija sada izgovara dodatne bitne informacije o objektu kada miš uđe u njega, kao što su stanja (označeno/pritisnuto) ili koordinate ćelija u tabeli. (#15420, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: New items have been added to the Help menu for the NV Access "Get Help" page and Shop. (#14631)
segment.target: Dodate su nove stavke u meni pomoći za NV Access "Get Help" stranicu i prodavnicu. (#14631)

segment.source: NVDA's support for [Poedit](https://poedit.net) is overhauled for Poedit version 3 and above.
segment.target: NVDA podrška za [Poedit](https://poedit.net) je redizajnirana za Poedit verziju 3 i novije.

segment.source: Users of Poedit 1 are encouraged to update to Poedit 3 if they want to rely on enhanced accessibility in Poedit, such as shortcuts to read translator notes and comments. (#15313, #7303, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Korisnicima Poedita 1 preporučuje se ažuriranje na Poedit 3 ako žele da se oslanjaju na poboljšanu pristupačnost u Poeditu, kao što su prečice za čitanje napomena za prevodioce i komentara. (#15313, #7303, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Braille viewer and speech viewer are now disabled in secure mode. (#15680)
segment.target: Pregled govora i pregled brajevog reda su sada onemogućeni u bezbednom režimu. (#15680)

segment.source: During object navigation, disabled (unavailable) objects will not be ignored anymore. (#15477, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Tokom navigacije objekata, onemogućeni (nedostupni) objekti više neće biti ignorisani. (#15477, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: Added table of contents to key commands document. (#16106)
segment.target: Dodat sadržaj u dokument kratkih napomena o komandama. (#16106)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravljene greške

segment.source: Add-on Store:
segment.target: Prodavnica dodataka:

segment.source: When the status of an add-on is changed while it has focus, e.g. a change from "downloading" to "downloaded", the updated item is now announced correctly. (#15859, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Kada se status dodatka promeni dok je fokusiran, na primer promena iz "Preuzimanje" u "Preuzeto", ažurirana stavka se sada ispravno izgovara. (#15859, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: When installing add-ons install prompts are no longer overlapped by the restart dialog. (#15613, @lukaszgo1)
segment.target: Kada se instaliraju dodaci zahtevi za instalaciju više neće biti preklopljeni dijalogom za ponovno pokretanje. (#15613, @lukaszgo1)

segment.source: When reinstalling an incompatible add-on it is no longer forcefully disabled. (#15584, @lukaszgo1)
segment.target: Kada se ponovo instalira nekompatibilan dodatak on više neće biti prisilno onemogućen. (#15584, @lukaszgo1)

segment.source: Disabled and incompatible add-ons can now be updated. (#15568, #15029)
segment.target: Onemogućeni i nekompatibilni dodaci se sada mogu ažurirati. (#15568, #15029)

segment.source: NVDA now recovers and displays an error in a case where an add-on fails to download correctly. (#15796)
segment.target: NVDA se sada oporavlja i prikazuje grešku u slučaju u kojem se dodatak ne preuzme ispravno. (#15796)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to restart intermittently after opening and closing Add-on Store. (#16019, @lukaszgo1)
segment.target: NVDA više neće imati povremenih problema da se ponovo pokrene nakon što se prodavnica dodataka otvori i zatvori. (#16019, @lukaszgo1)

segment.source: Audio:
segment.target: Zvuk:

segment.source: NVDA no longer freezes briefly when multiple sounds are played in rapid succession. (#15311, #15757, @jcsteh)
segment.target: NVDA se više ne zamrzava kratkotrajno kada se više zvukova reprodukuje jedan nakon drugog u kratkom vremenskom periodu. (#15311, #15757, @jcsteh)

segment.source: If the audio output device is set to something other than the default and that device becomes available again after being unavailable, NVDA will now switch back to the configured device instead of continuing to use the default device. (#15759, @jcsteh)
segment.target: Ako se izlazni uređaj za reprodukciju zvukova podesi na neki uređaj koji nije podrazumevani i taj uređaj ponovo postane dostupan nakon što je bio nedostupan, NVDA će se sada vratiti na podešeni uređaj umesto da nastavi da koristi podrazumevani uređaj. (#15759, @jcsteh)

segment.source: NVDA now resumes audio if the configuration of the output device changes or another application releases exclusive control of the device. (#15758, #15775, @jcsteh)
segment.target: NVDA sada nastavlja da reprodukuje zvukove ako se podešavanje izlaznog uređaja promeni ili neka druga aplikacija oslobodi uređaj od ekskluzivne kontrole uređaja. (#15758, #15775, @jcsteh)

segment.source: Braille:
segment.target: Brajevi redovi:

segment.source: Multi line braille displays will no longer crash the BRLTTY driver and are treated as one continuous display. (#15386)
segment.target: Brajevi redovi sa više redova više neće rušiti BRLTTY drajver i tretiraju se kao jedan neprekidan brajev red. (#15386)

segment.source: More objects which contain useful text are detected, and text content is displayed in braille. (#15605)
segment.target: Više objekata koji sadrže koristan tekst se prepoznaje, a tekstualni sadržaj se prikazuje na brajevom redu. (#15605)

segment.source: Contracted braille input works properly again. (#15773, @aaclause)
segment.target: Skraćeni brajev unos ponovo ispravno radi. (#15773, @aaclause)

segment.source: Braille is now updated when moving the navigator object between table cells in more situations (#15755, @Emil-18)
segment.target: Brajev red će se sada ažurirati kada se navigacioni objekat pomera između ćelija tabele u većem broju slučajeva (#15755, @Emil-18)

segment.source: The result of reporting current focus, current navigator object, and current selection commands is now shown in braille. (#15844, @Emil-18)
segment.target: Rezultat prijavljivanja trenutnog fokusa, trenutnog navigacionog objekta i komandi za prijavljivanje trenutnog izbora se sada prikazuje na brajevom redu. (#15844, @Emil-18)

segment.source: The Albatross braille driver no longer handles a Esp32 microcontroller as an Albatross display. (#15671)
segment.target: Albatross brajev drajver više ne obrađuje Esp32 mikrokontroler kao Albatross brajev red. (#15671)

segment.source: LibreOffice:
segment.target: LibreOffice:

segment.source: Words deleted using the `control+backspace` keyboard shortcut are now also properly announced when the deleted word is followed by whitespace (like spaces and tabs). (#15436, @michaelweghorn)
segment.target: Reči koje se obrišu prečicom `kontrol+backspace` se sada takođe ispravno izgovaraju kada obrisanu reč prati prazan prostor (kao što su razmaci ili tabulatori). (#15436, @michaelweghorn)

segment.source: Announcement of the status bar using the `NVDA+end` keyboard shortcut now also works for dialogs in LibreOffice version 24.2 and newer. (#15591, @michaelweghorn)
segment.target: Izgovor statusne trake korišćenjem prečice `NVDA+end` sada takođe radi u dijalozima LibreOffice verzije 24.2 i novijih. (#15591, @michaelweghorn)

segment.source: All expected text attributes are now supported in LibreOffice versions 24.2 and above.
segment.target: Svi očekivani atributi teksta su sada podržani uz LibreOffice verzije 24.2 i novije.

segment.source: This makes the announcement of spelling errors work when announcing a line in Writer. (#15648, @michaelweghorn)
segment.target: Ovo znači da će izgovor pravopisnih grešaka sada raditi kada se izgovara red u pisaču/Writeru. (#15648, @michaelweghorn)

segment.source: Announcement of heading levels now also works for LibreOffice versions 24.2 and newer. (#15881, @michaelweghorn)
segment.target: Izgovor nivoa naslova sada takođe radi za LibreOffice verzije 24.2 i novije. (#15881, @michaelweghorn)

segment.source: Microsoft Office:
segment.target: Microsoft Office:

segment.source: In Excel with UIA disabled, braille is updated, and the active cell content is spoken, when `control+y`, `control+z` or `alt+backspace` is pressed. (#15547)
segment.target: U Excelu uz UIA onemogućen, brajev red će se ažurirati i sadržaj aktivne ćelije će se izgovarati kada se pritisnu prečice `kontrol+y`, `kontrol+z` ili `alt+backspace`. (#15547)

segment.source: In Word with UIA disabled braille is updated when `control+v`, `control+x`, `control+y`, `control+z`, `alt+backspace`, `backspace` or `control+backspace` is pressed.
segment.target: U Wordu uz UIA onemogućen brajev red će se ažurirati kada se pritisnu prečice `kontrol+v`, `kontrol+x`, `kontrol+y`, `kontrol+z`, `alt+backspace`, `backspace` ili `kontrol+backspace`.

segment.source: It is also updated with UIA enabled, when typing text and braille is tethered to review and review follows caret. (#3276)
segment.target: Takođe će se ažurirati uz UIA omogućen kada pišete tekst a brajev je vezan za pregled i pregled prati sistemski kursor. (#3276)

segment.source: In Word, the landing cell will now be correctly reported when using the native Word commands for table navigation `alt+home`, `alt+end`, `alt+pageUp` and `alt+pageDown`. (#15805, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: U Wordu, ćelija na koju stanete će se sada ispravno prijavljivati kada koristite ugrađene Word komande za navigaciju po tabeli `alt+home`, `alt+end`, `alt+pageUp` i `alt+pageDown`. (#15805, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: Reporting of object shortcut keys has been improved. (#10807, #15816, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Prijavljivanje tasterskih prečica za objekte je poboljšano. (#10807, #15816, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: The SAPI4 synthesizer now properly supports volume, rate and pitch changes embedded in speech. (#15271, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: SAPI4 sintetizator sada ispravno podržava promene jačine, brzine i visine koje su umetnute u govoru. (#15271, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Multi line state is now correctly reported in applications using Java Access Bridge. (#14609)
segment.target: Mogućnost višelinijskog uređivanja se sada ispravno prijavljuje u aplikacijama koje koriste Java Access Bridge. (#14609)

segment.source: NVDA will announce dialog content for more Windows 10 and 11 dialogs. (#15729, @josephsl)
segment.target: NVDA će izgovarati sadržaj dijaloga u većem broju dijaloga na Windowsu 10 i 11. (#15729, @josephsl)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer fail to read a newly loaded page in Microsoft Edge when using UI Automation. (#15736)
segment.target: NVDA više neće imati problema sa čitanjem novo učitane stranice u programu Microsoft edge kada se koristi UI Automation. (#15736)

segment.source: When using say all or commands which spell text, pauses between sentences or characters no longer gradually decrease over time. (#15739, @jcsteh)
segment.target: Kada se koristi režim izgovori sve ili komande koje sriču tekst, pauze između rečenica ili znakova se više neće postepeno smanjivati kako vreme protiče. (#15739, @jcsteh)

segment.source: NVDA no longer sometimes freezes when speaking a large amount of text. (#15752, @jcsteh)
segment.target: NVDA se više neće ponekad rušiti kada izgovara veliku količinu teksta. (#15752, @jcsteh)

segment.source: When accessing Microsoft Edge using UI Automation, NVDA is able to activate more controls in browse mode. (#14612)
segment.target: Kada pristupate programu Microsoft Edge uz UI Automation, NVDA može da aktivira više kontrola u režimu pretraživanja. (#14612)

segment.source: NVDA will not fail to start anymore when the configuration file is corrupted, but it will restore the configuration to default as it did in the past. (#15690, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: NVDA više neće imati problema da se pokrene kada je datoteka sa podešavanjima oštećena, ali vratiće podešavanja na podrazumevana što je i ranije bio slučaj. (#15690, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: Fixed support for System List view (`SysListView32`) controls in Windows Forms applications. (#15283, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Popravljena podrška za kontrole sistemskog prikazivanja liste (`SysListView32`) u Windows Forms aplikacijama. (#15283, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: It is not possible anymore to overwrite NVDA's Python console history. (#15792, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Više nije moguće da zamenite istoriju NVDA Python konzole. (#15792, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: NVDA should remain responsive when being flooded with many UI Automation events, e.g. when large chunks of text are printed to a terminal or when listening to voice messages in WhatsApp messenger. (#14888, #15169)
segment.target: NVDA bi trebao da zadrži svoj odziv kada je preplavljen mnogim UI Automation događajima, na primer kada se u Terminalu pojavljuju veliki delovi teksta ili kada slušate glasovne poruke u programu WhatsApp messenger. (#14888, #15169)

segment.source: This new behavior can be disabled using the new "Use enhanced event processing" setting in NVDA's advanced settings.
segment.target: Ovo novo ponašanje se može onemogućiti opcijom "Koristi poboljšano obrađivanje događaja" u naprednim NVDA podešavanjima.

segment.source: NVDA is again able to track the focus in applications running within Windows Defender Application Guard (WDAG). (#15164)
segment.target: NVDA ponovo može da prati fokus u aplikacijama koje su pokrenute iz Windows Defender zaštitnika aplikacija (Windows defender application guard WDAG). (#15164)

segment.source: The speech text is no longer updated when the mouse moves in the Speech Viewer. (#15952, @hwf1324)
segment.target: Izgovoreni tekst se više ne ažurira kada se miš pomera u prozoru pregleda govora. (#15952, @hwf1324)

segment.source: NVDA will again switch back to browse mode when closing combo boxes with `escape` or `alt+upArrow` in Firefox or Chrome. (#15653)
segment.target: NVDA će se ponovo vratiti u režim pretraživanja kada zatvorite izborne okvire tasterom `escape` ili prečicom `alt+strelicaGore` u programima Firefox ili Chrome. (#15653)

segment.source: Arrowing up and down in combo boxes in iTunes will no longer inappropriately switch back to browse mode. (#15653)
segment.target: Kretanje strelicama gore ili dole u izbornim okvirima u programu iTunes se više neće bespotrebno vraćati u režim pretraživanja. (#15653)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promene za programere (engleski)

segment.source: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.
segment.target: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.

segment.source: Note: this is an Add-on API compatibility breaking release.
segment.target: Note: this is an Add-on API compatibility breaking release.

segment.source: Add-ons will need to be re-tested and have their manifest updated.
segment.target: Add-ons will need to be re-tested and have their manifest updated.

segment.source: Building NVDA now requires Visual Studio 2022.
segment.target: Building NVDA now requires Visual Studio 2022.

segment.source: Please refer to the [NVDA docs](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/release-2024.1/projectDocs/dev/createDevEnvironment.md) for the specific list of Visual Studio components. (#14313)
segment.target: Please refer to the [NVDA docs](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/release-2024.1/projectDocs/dev/createDevEnvironment.md) for the specific list of Visual Studio components. (#14313)

segment.source: Added the following extension points:
segment.target: Added the following extension points:

segment.source: `treeInterceptorHandler.post_browseModeStateChange`. (#14969, @nvdaes)
segment.target: `treeInterceptorHandler.post_browseModeStateChange`. (#14969, @nvdaes)

segment.source: `speech.speechCanceled`. (#15700, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: `speech.speechCanceled`. (#15700, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: `_onErrorSoundRequested` (should be retrieved calling `logHandler.getOnErrorSoundRequested()`) (#15691, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: `_onErrorSoundRequested` (should be retrieved calling `logHandler.getOnErrorSoundRequested()`) (#15691, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: It is now possible to use plural forms in an add-on's translations. (#15661, @beqabeqa473)
segment.target: It is now possible to use plural forms in an add-on's translations. (#15661, @beqabeqa473)

segment.source: Included python3.dll in the binary distribution for use by add-ons with external libraries utilizing the [stable ABI](https://docs.python.org/3.11/c-api/stable.html). (#15674, @mzanm)
segment.target: Included python3.dll in the binary distribution for use by add-ons with external libraries utilizing the [stable ABI](https://docs.python.org/3.11/c-api/stable.html). (#15674, @mzanm)

segment.source: The `BrailleDisplayDriver` base class now has `numRows` and `numCols` properties to provide information about multi line braille displays.
segment.target: The `BrailleDisplayDriver` base class now has `numRows` and `numCols` properties to provide information about multi line braille displays.

segment.source: Setting `numCells` is still supported for single line braille displays and `numCells` will return the total number of cells for multi line braille displays. (#15386)
segment.target: Setting `numCells` is still supported for single line braille displays and `numCells` will return the total number of cells for multi line braille displays. (#15386)

segment.source: Updated BrlAPI for BRLTTY to version 0.8.5, and its corresponding python module to a Python 3.11 compatible build. (#15652, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Updated BrlAPI for BRLTTY to version 0.8.5, and its corresponding python module to a Python 3.11 compatible build. (#15652, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Added the `speech.speakSsml` function, which allows you to write NVDA speech sequences using [SSML](https://www.w3.org/TR/speech-synthesis11/). (#15699, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Added the `speech.speakSsml` function, which allows you to write NVDA speech sequences using [SSML](https://www.w3.org/TR/speech-synthesis11/). (#15699, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: The following tags are currently supported and translated to appropriate NVDA speech commands:
segment.target: The following tags are currently supported and translated to appropriate NVDA speech commands:

segment.source: `Prosody` (`pitch`, `rate` and `volume`). Only multiplication (e.g. `200%` are supported.
segment.target: `Prosody` (`pitch`, `rate` and `volume`). Only multiplication (e.g. `200%` are supported.

segment.source: `say-as` with the `interpret` attribute set to `characters`
segment.target: `say-as` with the `interpret` attribute set to `characters`

segment.source: `voice` with the `xml:lang` set to an XML language
segment.target: `voice` with the `xml:lang` set to an XML language

segment.source: `break` with the `time` attribute set to a value in milliseconds, e.g. `200ms`
segment.target: `break` with the `time` attribute set to a value in milliseconds, e.g. `200ms`

segment.source: `mark` with the `name` attribute set to a mark name, e.g. `mark1`, requires providing a callback
segment.target: `mark` with the `name` attribute set to a mark name, e.g. `mark1`, requires providing a callback

segment.source: Example: `speech.speakSsml('<speak><prosody pitch="200%">hello</prosody><break time="500ms" /><prosody rate="50%">John</prosody></speak>')`
segment.target: Example: `speech.speakSsml('<speak><prosody pitch="200%">hello</prosody><break time="500ms" /><prosody rate="50%">John</prosody></speak>')`

segment.source: The SSML parsing capabilities are backed by the `SsmlParser` class in the `speechXml` module.
segment.target: The SSML parsing capabilities are backed by the `SsmlParser` class in the `speechXml` module.

segment.source: Changes to the NVDA Controller Client library:
segment.target: Changes to the NVDA Controller Client library:

segment.source: The file names of the library no longer contain a suffix denoting the architecture, i.e. `nvdaControllerClient32/64.dll` are now called `nvdaControllerClient.dll`. (#15718, #15717, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: The file names of the library no longer contain a suffix denoting the architecture, i.e. `nvdaControllerClient32/64.dll` are now called `nvdaControllerClient.dll`. (#15718, #15717, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Added an example to demonstrate using nvdaControllerClient.dll from Rust. (#15771, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Added an example to demonstrate using nvdaControllerClient.dll from Rust. (#15771, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Added the following functions to the controller client: (#15734, #11028, #5638, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Added the following functions to the controller client: (#15734, #11028, #5638, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: `nvdaController_getProcessId`: To get the process id (PID) of the current instance of NVDA the controller client is using.
segment.target: `nvdaController_getProcessId`: To get the process id (PID) of the current instance of NVDA the controller client is using.

segment.source: `nvdaController_speakSsml`: To instruct NVDA to speak according to the given SSML. This function also supports:
segment.target: `nvdaController_speakSsml`: To instruct NVDA to speak according to the given SSML. This function also supports:

segment.source: Providing the symbol level.
segment.target: Providing the symbol level.

segment.source: Providing the priority of speech to be spoken.
segment.target: Providing the priority of speech to be spoken.

segment.source: Speaking both synchronously (blocking) and asynchronously (instant return).
segment.target: Speaking both synchronously (blocking) and asynchronously (instant return).

segment.source: `nvdaController_setOnSsmlMarkReachedCallback`: To register a callback of type `onSsmlMarkReachedFuncType` that is called in synchronous mode for every `<mark />` tag encountered in the SSML sequence provided to `nvdaController_speakSsml`.
segment.target: `nvdaController_setOnSsmlMarkReachedCallback`: To register a callback of type `onSsmlMarkReachedFuncType` that is called in synchronous mode for every `<mark />` tag encountered in the SSML sequence provided to `nvdaController_speakSsml`.

segment.source: Note: the new functions in the controller client only support NVDA 2024.1 and above.
segment.target: Note: the new functions in the controller client only support NVDA 2024.1 and above.

segment.source: Updated `include` dependencies:
segment.target: Updated `include` dependencies:

segment.source: w3c-aria-practices to `9a5e55ccbeb0f1bf92b6127c9865da8426d1c864`. (#15695)
segment.target: w3c-aria-practices to `9a5e55ccbeb0f1bf92b6127c9865da8426d1c864`. (#15695)

segment.source: Device info yielded by `hwPortUtils.listUsbDevices` now contain the bus reported description of the USB device (key `busReportedDeviceDescription`). (#15764, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Device info yielded by `hwPortUtils.listUsbDevices` now contain the bus reported description of the USB device (key `busReportedDeviceDescription`). (#15764, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: For USB serial devices, `bdDetect.getConnectedUsbDevicesForDriver` and `bdDetect.getDriversForConnectedUsbDevices` now yield device matches containing a `deviceInfo` dictionary enriched with data about the USB device, such as `busReportedDeviceDescription`. (#15764, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: For USB serial devices, `bdDetect.getConnectedUsbDevicesForDriver` and `bdDetect.getDriversForConnectedUsbDevices` now yield device matches containing a `deviceInfo` dictionary enriched with data about the USB device, such as `busReportedDeviceDescription`. (#15764, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: When the configuration file `nvda.ini` is corrupted, a backup copy is saved before it is reinitialized. (#15779, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: When the configuration file `nvda.ini` is corrupted, a backup copy is saved before it is reinitialized. (#15779, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: When defining a script with the script decorator, the `speakOnDemand` boolean argument can be specified to control if a script should speak while in "on-demand" speech mode. (#481, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: When defining a script with the script decorator, the `speakOnDemand` boolean argument can be specified to control if a script should speak while in "on-demand" speech mode. (#481, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: Scripts that provide information (e.g. say window title, report time/date) should speak in the "on-demand" mode.
segment.target: Scripts that provide information (e.g. say window title, report time/date) should speak in the "on-demand" mode.

segment.source: Scripts that perform an action (e.g. move the cursor, change a parameter) should not speak in the "on-demand" mode.
segment.target: Scripts that perform an action (e.g. move the cursor, change a parameter) should not speak in the "on-demand" mode.

segment.source: Fixed bug where deleting git-tracked files during `scons -c` resulted in missing UIA COM interfaces on rebuild. (#7070, #10833, @hwf1324)
segment.target: Fixed bug where deleting git-tracked files during `scons -c` resulted in missing UIA COM interfaces on rebuild. (#7070, #10833, @hwf1324)

segment.source: Fix a bug where some code changes were not detected when building `dist`, that prevented a new build from being triggered.
segment.target: Fix a bug where some code changes were not detected when building `dist`, that prevented a new build from being triggered.

segment.source: Now `dist` always rebuilds. (#13372, @hwf1324)
segment.target: Now `dist` always rebuilds. (#13372, @hwf1324)

segment.source: A `gui.nvdaControls.MessageDialog` with default type of standard, no longer throws a None conversion exception because no sound is assigned. (#16223, @XLTechie)
segment.target: A `gui.nvdaControls.MessageDialog` with default type of standard, no longer throws a None conversion exception because no sound is assigned. (#16223, @XLTechie)

segment.target: API Breaking Changes

segment.target: These are breaking API changes.

segment.target: Please open a GitHub issue if your Add-on has an issue with updating to the new API.

segment.target: `braille.BrailleHandler.handlePendingCaretUpdate` has been removed with no public replacement. (#15163, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: `bdDetect.addUsbDevices and bdDetect.addBluetoothDevices` have been removed.
segment.target: `bdDetect.addUsbDevices and bdDetect.addBluetoothDevices` have been removed.

segment.source: Braille display drivers should implement the `registerAutomaticDetection` class method instead.
segment.target: Braille display drivers should implement the `registerAutomaticDetection` class method instead.

segment.source: That method receives a `DriverRegistrar` object on which the `addUsbDevices` and `addBluetoothDevices` methods can be used. (#15200, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: That method receives a `DriverRegistrar` object on which the `addUsbDevices` and `addBluetoothDevices` methods can be used. (#15200, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: The default implementation of the check method on `BrailleDisplayDriver` now requires both the `threadSafe` and `supportsAutomaticDetection` attributes to be set to `True`. (#15200, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: The default implementation of the check method on `BrailleDisplayDriver` now requires both the `threadSafe` and `supportsAutomaticDetection` attributes to be set to `True`. (#15200, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix a security issue and installer issue.
segment.target: Ovo je manje ažuriranje za ispravku bezbednosnog problema i problema sa instalacijom.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues following NVDA's [security policy](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md).
segment.target: Molimo odgovorno prijavite bezbednosne probleme tako što ćete pratiti [politiku bezbednosti programa NVDA](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md).

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Bezbednosne ispravke

segment.source: Prevents loading custom configuration while secure mode is forced.
segment.target: Sprečava učitavanje prilagođene konfiguracije kada je prisiljen bezbedni režim.

segment.source: ([GHSA-727q-h8j2-6p45](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-727q-h8j2-6p45))
segment.target: ([GHSA-727q-h8j2-6p45](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-727q-h8j2-6p45))

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravljene greške

segment.source: Fixed bug which caused the NVDA process to fail to exit correctly. (#16123)
segment.target: Ispravljena greška koja je izazvala da NVDA proces ne izađe ispravno. (#16123)

segment.source: Fixed bug where if the previous NVDA process failed to exit correctly, an NVDA installation could fail to an unrecoverable state. (#16122)
