segment.target: Ispravljena greška koja je izazvala da ako prethodni NVDA proces nije uspeo da se ispravno zatvori, NVDA instalacija je mogla da bude neuspešna bez oporavka. (#16122)

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix a security issue.
segment.target: Ovo je manje ažuriranje za ispravljanje bezbednosnog problema.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues following NVDA's [security policy](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md).
segment.target: Molimo odgovorno prijavite bezbednosne probleme tako što ćete pratiti [politiku bezbednosti programa NVDA](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md).

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Bezbednosne ispravke

segment.source: Prevents possible reflected XSS attack from crafted content to cause arbitrary code execution.
segment.target: Sprečavanje da mogući reflektovani XSS napad iz prilagođenog sadržaja izazove izvršavanje koda.

segment.source: ([GHSA-xg6w-23rw-39r8](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-xg6w-23rw-39r8))
segment.target: ([GHSA-xg6w-23rw-39r8](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-xg6w-23rw-39r8))

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix a security issue.
segment.target: Ovo je manje ažuriranje za ispravljanje bezbednosnog problema.

segment.source: The security patch in 2023.3.1 was not resolved correctly.
segment.target: Bezbednosna ispravka u verziji 2023.3.1 nije ispravno rešila problem.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues following NVDA's [security policy](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md).
segment.target: Molimo odgovorno prijavite bezbednosne probleme tako što ćete pratiti [politiku bezbednosti programa NVDA](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md).

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Bezbednosne ispravke

segment.source: The security patch in 2023.3.1 was not resolved correctly.
segment.target: Bezbednosna ispravka u verziji 2023.3.1 nije ispravno rešila problem.

segment.source: Prevents possible system access and arbitrary code execution with system privileges for unauthenticated users.
segment.target: Sprečava mogući pristup sistemu i izvršavanje koda sa sistemskim privilegijama za korisnike koji nisu autorizovani.

segment.source: ([GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj))
segment.target: ([GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj))

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix a security issue.
segment.target: Ovo je manje ažuriranje za ispravljanje bezbednosnog problema.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues following NVDA's [security policy](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md).
segment.target: Molimo odgovorno prijavite bezbednosne probleme tako što ćete pratiti [politiku bezbednosti programa NVDA](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md).

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Bezbednosne ispravke

segment.source: Prevents possible system access and arbitrary code execution with system privileges for unauthenticated users.
segment.target: Sprečava mogući pristup sistemu i izvršavanje koda sa sistemskim privilegijama za korisnike koji nisu autorizovani.

segment.source: ([GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj))
segment.target: ([GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj))

segment.source: This release includes improvements to performance, responsiveness and stability of audio output.
segment.target: Ova verzija uključuje poboljšanja u performansama, odzivu i stabilnosti zvukova.

segment.source: Options have been added to control the volume of NVDA sounds and beeps, or to have them follow the volume of the voice you are using.
segment.target: Dodate su opcije za kontrolisanje jačine NVDA zvukova i pištanja, ili da ove jačine prate jačinu glasa kojeg koristite.

segment.source: NVDA can now periodically refresh OCR results, speaking new text as it appears.
segment.target: NVDA sada može povremeno da osvežava OCR rezultate, izgovarajući novi tekst kada se pojavi.

segment.source: This can be configured in the Windows OCR category of NVDA's settings dialog.
segment.target: Ovo se može podesiti u Windows OCR kategoriji NVDA dijaloga podešavanja.

segment.source: There's been several braille fixes, improving device detection and caret movement.
segment.target: Sadrži nekoliko ispravki za brajeve redove, koje poboljšavaju prepoznavanje uređaja i pomeranje kursora.

segment.source: It is now possible to opt-out unwanted drivers from automatic detection, to improve autodetection performance.
segment.target: Sada je moguće izuzeti neželjene drajvere iz automatskog prepoznavanja, kako biste poboljšali performanse automatskog prepoznavanja.

segment.source: There are also new BRLTTY commands.
segment.target: Dodate su takođe nove BRLTTY komande.

segment.source: There's also been bug fixes for the Add-on Store, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Edge context menus, and Windows Calculator.
segment.target: Takođe sadrži ispravljene greške za prodavnicu dodataka, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Edge kontekstne menije, i Windows Kalkulator.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove karakteristike

segment.source: Enhanced sound management:
segment.target: Poboljšano upravljanje zvukovima:

segment.source: A new Audio Settings panel:
segment.target: Novi panel podešavanja zvuka:

segment.source: This can be opened with `NVDA+control+u`. (#15497)
segment.target: Može se otvoriti prečicom `NVDA+kontrol+u`. (#15497)

segment.source: An option in Audio settings to have the volume of NVDA sounds and beeps follow the volume setting of the voice you are using. (#1409)
segment.target: Opcija u podešavanjima zvuka da jačina NVDA zvukova i pištanja prati podešavanje jačine glasa kojeg koristite. (#1409)

segment.source: An option in Audio settings to separately configure the volume of NVDA sounds. (#1409, #15038)
segment.target: Opcija u podešavanjima zvuka da odvojeno podesite jačinu NVDA zvukova. (#1409, #15038)

segment.source: The settings to change audio output device and toggle audio ducking have been moved to the new Audio settings panel from the Select Synthesizer dialog.
segment.target: Podešavanja da promenite izlazni uređaj zvukova i režim stišavanja pozadinskih zvukova su premeštena u novi panel podešavanja zvuka iz dijaloga za izbor sintetizatora.

segment.source: These options will be removed from the "select synthesizer" dialog in 2024.1. (#15486, #8711)
segment.target: Ove opcije će biti uklonjene iz dijaloga "Izaberi sintetizator" u verziji 2024.1. (#15486, #8711)

segment.source: NVDA will now output audio via the Windows Audio Session API (WASAPI), which may improve the responsiveness, performance and stability of NVDA speech and sounds. (#14697, #11169, #11615, #5096, #10185, #11061)
segment.target: NVDA će sada reprodukovati zvukove korišćenjem Windows Audio Session API-a (WASAPI), što može poboljšati odziv, performanse i stabilnost NVDA govora i zvukova. (#14697, #11169, #11615, #5096, #10185, #11061)

segment.source: Note: WASAPI is incompatible with some add-ons.
segment.target: Napomena: WASAPI je nekompatibilan sa nekim dodacima.

segment.source: Compatible updates are available for these add-ons, please update them before updating NVDA.
segment.target: Kompatibilna ažuriranja su dostupna za ove dodatke, molimo ažurirajte ih pre nego što ažurirate NVDA.

segment.source: Incompatible versions of these add-ons will be disabled when updating NVDA:
segment.target: Nekompatibilne verzije ovih dodataka će biti onemogućene kada ažurirate NVDA:

segment.source: Tony's Enhancements version 1.15 or older. (#15402)
segment.target: Tony's Enhancements verzija 1.15 ili starija. (#15402)

segment.source: NVDA global commands extension 12.0.8 or older. (#15443)
segment.target: NVDA global commands extension 12.0.8 ili starija. (#15443)

segment.source: NVDA is now able to continually update the result when performing optical character recognition (OCR), speaking new text as it appears. (#2797)
segment.target: NVDA sada može stalno da ažurira rezultat kada se vrši optičko prepoznavanje teksta (OCR), a zatim da izgovara novi tekst kada se pojavi. (#2797)

segment.source: To enable this functionality, enable the option "Periodically refresh recognized content" in the Windows OCR category of NVDA's settings dialog.
segment.target: Da biste omogućili ovu funkciju, omogućite opciju "Povremeno osvežavaj prepoznat sadržaj" u Windows OCR kategoriji dijaloga NVDA podešavanja.

segment.source: Once enabled, you can toggle speaking new text by toggling report dynamic content changes (pressing `NVDA+5`).
segment.target: Nakon što je omogućena, možete uključiti ili isključiti izgovor novog teksta tako što ćete uključiti ili isključiti opciju prijavljivanja dinamičkih promena sadržaja (pritiskanjem `NVDA+5`).

segment.source: When using automatic detection of braille displays, it is now possible to opt-out drivers from detection from the braille display selection dialog. (#15196)
segment.target: Kada se koristi automatsko prepoznavanje brajevih redova, sada je moguće izuzeti drajvere iz prepoznavanja u dijalogu za izbor brajevog reda. (#15196)

segment.source: A new option in Document Formatting settings, "Ignore blank lines for line indentation reporting". (#13394)
segment.target: Nova opcija u podešavanjima formatiranja dokumenta, "Zanemari prazne redove za prijavljivanje uvlačenja redova". (#13394)

segment.source: Added an unassigned gesture to navigate by tab groupings in browse mode. (#15046)
segment.target: Dodata nedodeljena komanda za navigaciju po grupama kartica u režimu pretraživanja. (#15046)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promene

segment.source: Braille:
segment.target: Brajevi redovi:

segment.source: When the text in a terminal changes without updating the caret, the text on a braille display will now properly update when positioned on a changed line.
segment.target: Kada se tekst u Terminalu promeni bez ažuriranja kursora, tekst na brajevom redu će se sada ispravno ažurirati kada se nalazi na promenjenom redu.

segment.source: This includes situations where braille is tethered to review. (#15115)
segment.target: Ovo uključuje situacije u kojima je brajev red vezan za pregled. (#15115)

segment.source: More BRLTTY key bindings are now mapped to NVDA commands (#6483):
segment.target: Još BRLTTY tasterskih kombinacija sada imaju dodeljene NVDA komande (#6483):

segment.source: `learn`: toggle NVDA input help
segment.target: `learn`: Uključuje ili isključuje NVDA pomoć za unos

segment.source: `prefmenu`: open the NVDA menu
segment.target: `prefmenu`: Otvara NVDA meni

segment.source: `prefload`/`prefsave`: Load/save NVDA configuration
segment.target: `prefload`/`prefsave`: Učitava ili čuva NVDA podešavanja

segment.source: `time`: Show time
segment.target: `time`: Prikazuje vreme

segment.source: `say_line`: Speak the current line where the review cursor is located
segment.target: `say_line`: Izgovara trenutni red u kojem se nalazi pregledni kursor

segment.source: `say_below`: Say all using review cursor
segment.target: `say_below`: Izgovara sve korišćenjem preglednog kursora

segment.source: The BRLTTY driver is only available when a BRLTTY instance with BrlAPI enabled is running. (#15335)
segment.target: BRLTTY drajver je dostupan samo kada je BRLTTY instanca uz BrlAPI omogućen pokrenuta. (#15335)

segment.source: The advanced setting to enable support for HID braille has been removed in favor of a new option.
segment.target: Napredno podešavanje da omogućite podršku za HID brajeve redove je uklonjeno uz zamenu novom opcijom.

segment.source: You can now disable specific drivers for braille display auto detection in the braille display selection dialog. (#15196)
segment.target: Sada možete da onemogućite određene drajvere za automatsko prepoznavanje u dijalogu za izbor brajevog reda. (#15196)

segment.source: Add-on Store: Installed add-ons will now be listed in the Available Add-ons tab, if they are available in the store. (#15374)
segment.target: Prodavnica dodataka: Instalirani dodaci će sada biti prikazani na kartici za dostupne dodatke, ako su dostupni u prodavnici. (#15374)

segment.source: Some shortcut keys have been updated in the NVDA menu. (#15364)
segment.target: Neke prečice u NVDA meniju su ažurirane. (#15364)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravljene greške

segment.source: Microsoft Office:
segment.target: Microsoft Office:

segment.source: Fixed crash in Microsoft Word when Document formatting options "report headings" and "report comments and notes" were not enabled. (#15019)
segment.target: Ispravljeno rušenje u programu Microsoft Word kada opcije formatiranja dokumenta "Prijavi naslove" i "Prijavi komentare i napomene" nisu omogućene. (#15019)

segment.source: In Word and Excel, text alignment will be correctly reported in more situations. (#15206, #15220)
segment.target: U Wordu i Excelu, poravnavanje teksta će biti ispravno prijavljeno u više situacija. (#15206, #15220)

segment.source: Fixes the announcement of some cell formatting shortcuts in Excel. (#15527)
segment.target: Ispravljen izgovor nekih prečica formatiranja ćelije u Excelu. (#15527)

segment.source: Microsoft Edge:
segment.target: Microsoft Edge:

segment.source: NVDA will no longer jump back to the last browse mode position when opening the context menu in Microsoft Edge. (#15309)
segment.target: NVDA se više neće vraćati nazad na poslednju poziciju u režimu pretraživanja kada se otvori kontekstni meni u programu Microsoft Edge. (#15309)

segment.source: NVDA is once again able to read context menus of downloads in Microsoft Edge. (#14916)
segment.target: NVDA ponovo može da čita kontekstne menije preuzimanja u programu Microsoft Edge. (#14916)

segment.source: Braille:
segment.target: Brajevi redovi:

segment.source: The braille cursor and selection indicators will now always be updated correctly after showing or hiding respective indicators with a gesture. (#15115)
segment.target: Pokazivači brajevog kursora i izbora će se sada uvek ispravno ažurirati nakon što prikažete ili sakrijete odgovarajuće pokazivače komandom. (#15115)

segment.source: Fixed bug where Albatross braille displays try to initialize although another braille device has been connected. (#15226)
segment.target: Ispravljena greška u kojoj su Albatross brajevi redovi pokušavali da se učitaju iako je drugi brajev red povezan. (#15226)

segment.source: Add-on Store:
segment.target: Prodavnica dodataka:

segment.source: Fixed bug where unchecking "include incompatible add-ons" would result in incompatible add-ons still being listed in the store. (#15411)
segment.target: Ispravljena greška koja je izazivala da kada se onemogući opcija "Uključi nekompatibilne dodatke" nekompatibilni dodaci bi i dalje bili prikazani u prodavnici. (#15411)

segment.source: Add-ons blocked due to compatibility reasons should now be filtered correctly when toggling the filter for enabled/disabled status. (#15416)
segment.target: Dodaci koji su blokirani zbog kompatibilnosti će se sada ispravno filtrirati kada se uključi ili isključi izdvajanje omogućenih ili onemogućenih dodataka. (#15416)

segment.source: Fixed bug preventing overridden enabled incompatible add-ons being upgraded or replaced using the external install tool. (#15417)
segment.target: Ispravljena greška koja je sprečavala da nekompatibilni dodaci koji su instalirani i omogućeni budu ažurirani ili zamenjeni korišćenjem alatke za eksternu instalaciju. (#15417)

segment.source: Fixed bug where NVDA would not speak until restarted after add-on installation. (#14525)
segment.target: Ispravljena greška koja je izazivala da NVDA ne govori dok se ponovo ne pokrene nakon instalacije dodatka. (#14525)

segment.source: Fixed bug where add-ons cannot be installed if a previous download failed or was cancelled. (#15469)
segment.target: Ispravljena greška koja je izazivala da dodaci ne mogu da se instaliraju ako je prethodno preuzimanje bilo neuspešno ili je otkazano. (#15469)

segment.source: Fixed issues with handling incompatible add-ons when upgrading NVDA. (#15414, #15412, #15437)
segment.target: Ispravljene greške sa obrađivanjem nekompatibilnih dodataka kada se ažurira NVDA. (#15414, #15412, #15437)

segment.source: NVDA once again announces calculation results in the Windows 32bit calculator on Server, LTSC and LTSB versions of Windows. (#15230)
segment.target: NVDA ponovo izgovara rezultate računanja u Windows 32bitnom Kalkulatoru na serverskim, LTSC i LTSB verzijama Windowsa. (#15230)

segment.source: NVDA no longer ignores focus changes when a nested window (grand child window) gets focus. (#15432)
segment.target: NVDA više ne ignoriše promene fokusa kada se nizani prozor fokusira. (#15432)

segment.source: Fixed a potential cause of crashing during NVDA startup. (#15517)
segment.target: Ispravljen mogući uzrok rušenja pri pokretanju programa NVDA. (#15517)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promene za programere (engleski)

segment.source: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.
segment.target: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.

segment.source: `braille.handler.handleUpdate` and `braille.handler.handleReviewMove` have been changed in order not to update instantly.
segment.target: `braille.handler.handleUpdate` and `braille.handler.handleReviewMove` have been changed in order not to update instantly.

segment.source: Before this change, when either of these methods was called very often, this would drain many resources.
segment.target: Before this change, when either of these methods was called very often, this would drain many resources.

segment.source: These methods now queue an update at the end of every core cycle instead.
segment.target: These methods now queue an update at the end of every core cycle instead.

segment.source: They should also be thread safe, making it possible to call them from background threads. (#15163)
segment.target: They should also be thread safe, making it possible to call them from background threads. (#15163)

segment.source: Added official support to register custom braille display drivers in the automatic braille display detection process.
segment.target: Added official support to register custom braille display drivers in the automatic braille display detection process.

segment.source: Consult the `braille.BrailleDisplayDriver` class documentation for more details.
segment.target: Consult the `braille.BrailleDisplayDriver` class documentation for more details.

segment.source: Most notably, the `supportsAutomaticDetection` attribute must be set to `True` and the `registerAutomaticDetection` `classmethod` must be implemented. (#15196)
segment.target: Most notably, the `supportsAutomaticDetection` attribute must be set to `True` and the `registerAutomaticDetection` `classmethod` must be implemented. (#15196)

segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Deprecations

segment.source: `braille.BrailleHandler.handlePendingCaretUpdate` is now deprecated with no public replacement.
segment.target: `braille.BrailleHandler.handlePendingCaretUpdate` is now deprecated with no public replacement.

segment.source: It will be removed in 2024.1. (#15163)
segment.target: It will be removed in 2024.1. (#15163)

segment.source: Importing the constants `xlCenter`, `xlJustify`, `xlLeft`, `xlRight`, `xlDistributed`, `xlBottom`, `xlTop` from `NVDAObjects.window.excel` is deprecated.
segment.target: Importing the constants `xlCenter`, `xlJustify`, `xlLeft`, `xlRight`, `xlDistributed`, `xlBottom`, `xlTop` from `NVDAObjects.window.excel` is deprecated.

segment.source: Use `XlHAlign` or `XlVAlign` enumerations instead. (#15205)
segment.target: Use `XlHAlign` or `XlVAlign` enumerations instead. (#15205)

segment.source: The mapping `NVDAObjects.window.excel.alignmentLabels` is deprecated.
segment.target: The mapping `NVDAObjects.window.excel.alignmentLabels` is deprecated.

segment.source: Use the `displayString` methods of `XlHAlign` or `XlVAlign` enumerations instead. (#15205)
segment.target: Use the `displayString` methods of `XlHAlign` or `XlVAlign` enumerations instead. (#15205)

segment.source: `bdDetect.addUsbDevices` and `bdDetect.addBluetoothDevices` have been deprecated.
segment.target: `bdDetect.addUsbDevices` and `bdDetect.addBluetoothDevices` have been deprecated.

segment.source: Braille display drivers should implement the `registerAutomaticDetection` classmethod instead.
segment.target: Braille display drivers should implement the `registerAutomaticDetection` classmethod instead.

segment.source: That method receives a `DriverRegistrar` object on which the `addUsbDevices` and `addBluetoothDevices` methods can be used. (#15200)
segment.target: That method receives a `DriverRegistrar` object on which the `addUsbDevices` and `addBluetoothDevices` methods can be used. (#15200)

segment.source: The default implementation of the check method on `BrailleDisplayDriver` uses `bdDetect.driverHasPossibleDevices` for devices that are marked as thread safe.
segment.target: The default implementation of the check method on `BrailleDisplayDriver` uses `bdDetect.driverHasPossibleDevices` for devices that are marked as thread safe.

segment.source: Starting from NVDA 2024.1, in order for the base method to use `bdDetect.driverHasPossibleDevices`, the `supportsAutomaticDetection` attribute must be set to `True` as well. (#15200)
segment.target: Starting from NVDA 2024.1, in order for the base method to use `bdDetect.driverHasPossibleDevices`, the `supportsAutomaticDetection` attribute must be set to `True` as well. (#15200)

segment.source: This release introduces the Add-on Store to replace the Add-ons Manager.
segment.target: Ova verzija dodaje prodavnicu dodataka koja menja upravljača dodacima.

segment.source: In the Add-on Store you can browse, search, install and update community add-ons.
segment.target: U prodavnici dodataka možete da istražujete, pretražujete, instalirate i ažurirate dodatke zajednice.

segment.source: You can now manually override incompatibility issues with outdated add-ons at your own risk.
segment.target: Sada možete ručno da ignorišete probleme kompatibilnosti sa zastarelim dodacima na sopstvenu odgovornost.

segment.source: There are new braille features, commands, and display support.
segment.target: Dodate su nove funkcije za brajeve redove, komande i novi podržani brajevi redovi.

segment.source: There are also new input gestures for OCR and flattened object navigation.
segment.target: Takođe su dodate nove prečice za OCR i ravnu navigaciju kroz objekte.

segment.source: Navigating and reporting formatting in Microsoft Office is improved.
segment.target: Navigacija i prijavljivanje formatiranja u Microsoft Office paketu je poboljšana.

segment.source: There are many bug fixes, particularly for braille, Microsoft Office, web browsers and Windows 11.
segment.target: Puno grešaka je ispravljeno, posebno za brajeve redove, Microsoft Office, web pretraživače i Windows 11.

segment.source: eSpeak-NG, LibLouis braille translator, and Unicode CLDR have been updated.
segment.target: eSpeak-NG, LibLouis braille translator, i Unicode CLDR su ažurirani.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove karakteristike

segment.source: Add-on Store has been added to NVDA. (#13985)
segment.target: Prodavnica dodataka je dodata u NVDA. (#13985)

segment.source: Browse, search, install and update community add-ons.
segment.target: Istraživanje, pretraga, instalacija i ažuriranje dodataka zajednice.

segment.source: Manually override incompatibility issues with outdated add-ons.
segment.target: Ručno učitajte nekompatibilne NVDA dodatke.

segment.source: The Add-ons Manager has been removed and replaced by the Add-on Store.
segment.target: Upravljač dodataka je uklonjen i zamenjen prodavnicom dodataka.

segment.source: For more information please read the updated user guide.
segment.target: za više informacija molimo pročitajte ažurirano korisničko uputstvo.

segment.source: New input gestures:
segment.target: Nove ulazne komande:

segment.source: An unbound gesture to cycle through the available languages for Windows OCR. (#13036)
segment.target: Komanda bez dodeljene prečice kako biste kružili kroz dostupne jezike za Windows OCR. (#13036)

segment.source: An unbound gesture to cycle through the braille show messages modes. (#14864)
segment.target: Komanda bez dodeljene prečice kako biste kružili kroz režime prikazivanja poruka na brajevom redu. (#14864)

segment.source: An unbound gesture to toggle showing the selection indicator for braille. (#14948)
segment.target: Komanda bez dodeljene prečice kako biste uključili ili isključili pokazivač izbora na brajevom redu. (#14948)

segment.source: Added default keyboard gesture assignments to move to the next or previous object in a flattened view of the object hierarchy. (#15053)
segment.target: Dodate podrazumevane prečice na tastaturi za pomeranje na sledeći ili prethodni objekat u ravnom prikazu hierarhije objekata. (#15053)

segment.source: Desktop: `NVDA+numpad9` and `NVDA+numpad3` to move to the previous and next objects respectively.
segment.target: Desktop: `NVDA+numeričko9` i `NVDA+numeričko3` da se pomerite na sledeći ili prethodni objekat.

segment.source: Laptop: `shift+NVDA+[` and `shift+NVDA+]` to move to the previous and next objects respectively.
segment.target: Laptop: `šift+NVDA+[` i `šift+NVDA+]` da se pomerite na prethodni i sledeći objekat.

segment.source: New braille features:
segment.target: Nove funkcije za brajeve redove:

segment.source: Added support for the Help Tech Activator braille display. (#14917)
segment.target: Dodata podrška za Help Tech Activator brajev red. (#14917)

segment.source: A new option to toggle showing the selection indicator (dots 7 and 8). (#14948)
segment.target: Nova opcija za uključivanje ili isključivanje prikazivanja pokazivača izbora (tačkice 7 i 8). (#14948)

segment.source: A new option to optionally move the system caret or focus when changing the review cursor position with braille routing keys. (#14885, #3166)
segment.target: Nova opcija za pomeranje sistemskog kursora ili fokusa kada se menja pozicija preglednog kursora brajevim tasterima. (#14885, #3166)

segment.source: When pressing `numpad2` three times to report the numerical value of the character at the position of the review cursor, the information is now also provided in braille. (#14826)
segment.target: Kada se pritisne `numeričko2` tri puta da bi se prijavila brojčana vrednost znaka na poziciji preglednog kursora, informacija se takođe pruža na brajevom redu. (#14826)

segment.source: Added support for the `aria-brailleroledescription` ARIA 1.3 attribute, allowing web authors to override the type of an element shown on the braille display. (#14748)
segment.target: Dodata podrška za `aria-brailleroledescription` ARIA 1.3 atribut, koji će dozvoliti autorima sajtova da zamene vrstu elementa koja će se prikazati na brajevom redu. (#14748)

segment.source: Baum braille driver: added several braille chord gestures for performing common keyboard commands such as `windows+d` and `alt+tab`.
segment.target: Baum brajev drajver: Dodato nekoliko vezanih brajevih komandi za izvršavanje čestih prečica na tastaturi kao što su `windows+d` i `alt+tab`.

segment.source: Please refer to the NVDA User Guide for a full list. (#14714)
segment.target: Molimo pogledajte NVDA korisničko uputstvo za potpunu listu. (#14714)

segment.source: Added pronunciation of Unicode symbols:
segment.target: Dodat izgovor unikodnih simbola:

segment.source: braille symbols such as `⠐⠣⠃⠗⠇⠐⠜`. (#13778)
segment.target: Brajevi simboli kao što su `⠐⠣⠃⠗⠇⠐⠜`. (#14548)

segment.source: Mac Option key symbol `⌥`. (#14682)
segment.target: Simbol za Mac taster opcije `⌥`. (#14682)

segment.source: Added gestures for Tivomatic Caiku Albatross braille displays. (#14844, #15002)
segment.target: Dodate komande za Tivomatic Caiku Albatross brajeve redove. (#14844, #15002)

segment.source: showing the braille settings dialog
segment.target: Prikazivanje dijaloga brajevih podešavanja

segment.source: accessing the status bar
segment.target: Pristup statusnoj traci

segment.source: cycling the braille cursor shape
segment.target: Menjanje oblika brajevog kursora

segment.source: cycling the braille show messages mode
segment.target: Menjanje režima prikazivanja poruka

segment.source: toggling the braille cursor on/off
segment.target: Uključivanje i isključivanje brajevog kursora

segment.source: toggling the "braille show selection indicator" state
segment.target: Uključivanje i isključivanje pokazivača izbora na brajevom redu

segment.source: cycling the "braille move system caret when routing review cursor" mode. (#15122)
segment.target: Menjanje opcije "Brajevo pomeranje kursora kada se prebacuje pregledni kursor". (#15122)

segment.source: Microsoft Office features:
segment.target: Microsoft Office funkcije:

segment.source: When highlighted text is enabled Document Formatting, highlight colours are now reported in Microsoft Word. (#7396, #12101, #5866)
segment.target: Kada se omogući prijavljivanje obeleženog teksta u opcijama formatiranja dokumenta, obeležene boje se sada prijavljuju u Microsoft Wordu. (#7396, #12101, #5866)

segment.source: When colors are enabled Document Formatting, background colours are now reported in Microsoft Word. (#5866)
segment.target: Kada se omoguće boje u opcijama formatiranja dokumenta, boje pozadine se sada prijavljuju u Microsoft Wordu. (#5866)

segment.source: When using Excel shortcuts to toggle format such as bold, italic, underline and strike through of a cell in Excel, the result is now reported. (#14923)
segment.target: Kada se koriste Excel prečice da uključite ili isključite opcije formatiranja kao što su podebljano, iskošeno, podvučeno i precrtano za ćeliju u Excelu, rezultat se sada prijavljuje. (#14923)

segment.source: Experimental enhanced sound management:
segment.target: Eksperimentalno poboljšano upravljanje zvukovima:

segment.source: NVDA can now output audio via the Windows Audio Session API (WASAPI), which may improve the responsiveness, performance and stability of NVDA speech and sounds. (#14697)
segment.target: NVDA sada može da reprodukuje zvukove korišćenjem standarda Windows Audio Session API (WASAPI), što može poboljšati brzinu, performanse i stabilnost NVDA govora i zvukova.

segment.source: WASAPI usage can be enabled in Advanced settings.
segment.target: WASAPI korišćenje se može omogućiti u naprednim podešavanjima.

segment.source: Additionally, if WASAPI is enabled, the following Advanced settings can also be configured.
segment.target: Takođe, ako je WASAPI omogućen, sledeća napredna podešavanja se mogu podesiti.

segment.source: An option to have the volume of NVDA sounds and beeps follow the volume setting of the voice you are using. (#1409)
segment.target: Opcija koja će izazvati da jačina NVDA zvukova i pištanja prati podešavanje jačine glasa kojeg koristite. (#1409)

segment.source: An option to separately configure the volume of NVDA sounds. (#1409, #15038)
segment.target: Opcija da odvojeno podesite jačinu NVDA zvukova. (#1409, #15038)

segment.source: There is a known issue with intermittent crashing when WASAPI is enabled. (#15150)
segment.target: Postoji poznat problem sa povremenim rušenjem kada je WASAPI omogućen. (#15150)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome, NVDA now reports when a control opens a dialog, grid, list or tree if the author has specified this using `aria-haspopup`. (#8235)
segment.target: U pretraživačima Mozilla Firefox i Google Chrome, NVDA sada prijavljuje ako kontrola otvara dijalog, mrežu, listu ili stablo ako je autor ovo označio korišćenjem `aria-haspopup`. (#14709)

segment.source: It is now possible to use system variables (such as `%temp%` or `%homepath%`) in the path specification while creating portable copies of NVDA. (#14680)
segment.target: Sada je moguće koristiti sistemske varijable (kao što su `%temp%` ili `%homepath%`) pri određivanju putanje kada se pravi NVDA prenosna kopija. (#14680)

segment.source: In Windows 10 May 2019 Update and later, NVDA can announce virtual desktop names when opening, changing, and closing them. (#5641)
segment.target: u ažuriranju Windowsa 10 iz maja 2019 i novijim, NVDA može izgovarati imena virtuelnih radnih površina kada se otvaraju, menjaju ili zatvaraju. (#5641)

segment.source: A system wide parameter has been added to allow users and system administrators to force NVDA to start in secure mode. (#10018)
segment.target: Sistemski parametar je dodat koji će dozvoliti korisnicima i administratorima sistema da nateraju NVDA da se pokrene u bezbednom režimu. (#10018)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promene

segment.source: Component updates:
segment.target: Ažurirane komponente:

segment.source: eSpeak NG has been updated to 1.52-dev commit `ed9a7bcf`. (#15036)
segment.target: eSpeak NG je ažuriran na 1.52-dev commit `ed9a7bcf`. (#15036)

segment.source: Updated LibLouis braille translator to [3.26.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.26.0). (#14970)
segment.target: Ažuriran LibLouis brajev prevodilac na [3.26.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.26.0). (#14970)

segment.source: CLDR has been updated to version 43.0. (#14918)
segment.target: CLDR je ažuriran na verziju 43.0. (#14918)

segment.source: LibreOffice changes:
segment.target: LibreOffice promene:

segment.source: When reporting the review cursor location, the current cursor/caret location is now reported relative to the current page in LibreOffice Writer 7.6 and newer, similar to what is done for Microsoft Word. (#11696)
segment.target: Kada se prijavljuje lokacija preglednog kursora, trenutna lokacija kursora se sada prijavljuje u odnosu na trenutnu stranicu u programu LibreOffice Writer za LibreOffice verzije 7.6 i novije, slično prijavljivanju u programu Microsoft Word. (#11696)

segment.source: Announcement of the status bar (e.g. triggered by `NVDA+end`) works for LibreOffice. (#11698)
segment.target: Izgovor statusne trake (na primer kada se pritisne `NVDA+end`) radi u paketu LibreOffice. (#11698)

segment.source: When moving to a different cell in LibreOffice Calc, NVDA no longer incorrectly announces the coordinates of the previously focused cell when cell coordinate announcement is disabled in NVDA's settings. (#15098)
segment.target: Kada se prebacite na neku drugu ćeliju u programu LibreOffice Calc, NVDA više neće neispravno izgovarati koordinate prethodno fokusirane ćelije kada se izgovor koordinata ćelija onemogući u NVDA podešavanjima. (#15098)

segment.source: Braille changes:
segment.target: Brajeve promene:

segment.source: When using a braille display via the Standard HID braille driver, the dpad can be used to emulate the arrow keys and enter.
segment.target: Kada se koristi brajev red uz drajver za HID brajev standard, strelice se sada mogu koristiti za emuliranje strelica tastature i entera.

segment.source: Also `space+dot1` and `space+dot4` now map to up and down arrow respectively. (#14713)
segment.target: Takođe, `razmak+tačkica1` i `razmak+tačkica4` su sada podešene kao strelice dole i gore. (#14713)

segment.source: Updates to dynamic web content (ARIA live regions) are now displayed in braille.
segment.target: Ažuriranja dinamičkog sadržaja na Webu (ARIA živi regioni) se sada prikazuju na brajevom redu.

segment.source: This can be disabled in the Advanced Settings panel. (#7756)
segment.target: Ovo se može onemogućiti u panelu naprednih podešavanja. (#7756)

segment.source: Dash and em-dash symbols will always be sent to the synthesizer. (#13830)
segment.target: Simboli crtica i em- će uvek biti poslati sintetizatoru. (#13830)

segment.source: Distance reported in Microsoft Word will now honour the unit defined in Word's advanced options even when using UIA to access Word documents. (#14542)
segment.target: Distanca koju Microsoft Word prijavljuje će sada poštovati mernu jedinicu koja je podešena u naprednim podešavanjima Worda čak i kada se koristi UIA za pristup Word dokumentima. (#14542)

segment.source: NVDA responds faster when moving the cursor in edit controls. (#14708)
segment.target: NVDA brže reaguje kada se pomera kursor u kontrolama za uređivanje. (#14708)

segment.source: Script for reporting the destination of a link now reports from the caret / focus position rather than the navigator object. (#14659)
segment.target: Skripta za prijavljivanje odredišta linka sada prijavljuje sa pozicije kursora ili fokusa umesto navigacionog objekta. (#14659)

segment.source: Portable copy creation no longer requires that a drive letter be entered as part of the absolute path. (#14680)
segment.target: Pravljenje prenosne kopije više ne zahteva da upišete slovo diska kao deo apsolutne putanje. (#14680)

segment.source: If Windows is configured to display seconds in the system tray clock, using `NVDA+f12` to report the time now honors that setting. (#14742)
segment.target: Ako je Windows podešen da prijavljuje sekunde na satu sistemske trake, korišćenje prečice `NVDA+f12` za prijavljivanje vremena sada prati ovo podešavanje. (#14742)

segment.source: NVDA will now report unlabeled groupings that have useful position information, such as in recent versions of Microsoft Office 365 menus. (#14878)
segment.target: NVDA će sada prijavljivati grupe bez oznake koje imaju korisne informacijje o poziciji, kakve se mogu pronaći u novijim verzijama Microsoft Office 365 menija. (#14878)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravljene greške

segment.source: Braille:
segment.target: Brajevi redovi:

segment.source: Several stability fixes to input/output for braille displays, resulting in less frequent errors and crashes of NVDA. (#14627)
segment.target: Nekoliko poboljšanja u stabilnosti unosa/izlaza na brajevom redu, što će smanjiti učestalost grešaka i rušenja programa NVDA. (#14627)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer unnecessarily switch to no braille multiple times during auto detection, resulting in a cleaner log and less overhead. (#14524)
segment.target: NVDA se više neće bespotrebno prebacivati na opciju bez brajevog reda više puta u toku automatskog prepoznavanja, što donosi čistije dnevnike evidencije i manje opterećenje. (#14524)

segment.source: NVDA will now switch back to USB if a HID Bluetooth device (such as the HumanWare Brailliant or APH Mantis) is automatically detected and an USB connection becomes available.
segment.target: NVDA će se sada vratiti na USB ako HID Bluetooth uređaj (kao što je HumanWare Brailliant ili APH Mantis) automatski bude prepoznat i USB veza postane dostupna.

segment.source: This only worked for Bluetooth Serial ports before. (#14524)
segment.target: Ovo je ranije radilo samo za Bluetooth serijske portove. (#14524)

segment.source: When no braille display is connected and the braille viewer is closed by pressing `alt+f4` or clicking the close button, the display size of the braille subsystem will again be reset to no cells. (#15214)
segment.target: Kada nijedan brajev red nije povezan i preglednik brajevog reda se zatvori pritiskanjem `alt+f4` ili klikom na dugme zatvori, veličina brajevog podsistema će ponovo biti vraćena na bez ćelija. (#15214)

segment.source: Web browsers:
segment.target: Web pretraživači:

segment.source: NVDA no longer occasionally causes Mozilla Firefox to crash or stop responding. (#14647)
segment.target: NVDA više neće ponekad izazivati rušenje ili prestanak rada programa Mozilla Firefox. (#14647)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome, typed characters are no longer reported in some text boxes even when speak typed characters is disabled. (#8442)
segment.target: U pretraživačima Mozilla Firefox i Google Chrome, ukucani znakovi se više ne prijavljuju u nekim poljima za unos teksta čak i kada je izgovor ukucanih znakova onemogućen. (#8442)

segment.source: You can now use browse mode in Chromium Embedded Controls where it was not possible previously. (#13493, #8553)
segment.target: Sada možete da koristite režim pretraživanja u Chromium umetnutim kontrolama u kojima to ranije nije bilo moguće. (#13493, #8553)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox, moving the mouse over text after a link now reliably reports the text. (#9235)
segment.target: U Mozilli Firefox, pomeranje miša do teksta nakon linka sada ispravno prijavljuje tekst. (#9235)

segment.source: The destination of graphic links is now reported accurately in more cases in Chrome and Edge. (#14783)
segment.target: Odredište linkova na slikama se sada preciznije ispravno prijavljuje u većini slučajeva u programima Chrome i Edge. (#14779)

segment.source: When trying to report the URL for a link without a href attribute NVDA is no longer silent.
segment.target: Kada pokušavate da čitate adresu linka bez href atributa NVDA više neće biti bez govora.

segment.source: Instead NVDA reports that the link has no destination. (#14723)
segment.target: Umesto togag NVDA će prijaviti da link nema odredište. (#14723)

segment.source: In Browse mode, NVDA will no longer incorrectly ignore focus moving to a parent or child control e.g. moving from a control to its parent list item or gridcell. (#14611)
segment.target: U režimu pretraživanja, NVDA neće neispravno ignorisati pomeranje fokusa na glavnu kontrolu ili kontrolu unutar nje na primer pomeranje sa kontrole na njenu unutrašnju stavku liste ili ćeliju mreže. (#14611)

segment.source: Note however that this fix only applies when the Automatically set focus to focusable elements" option in Browse Mode settings is turned off (which is the default).
segment.target: Napomena međutim da se ova ispravka primenjuje samo kada je opcija "Automatsko postavljanje fokusa na elemente koji se mogu fokusirati" u podešavanjima režima pretraživanja isključena (što je podrazumevano podešavanje).

segment.source: Fixes for Windows 11:
segment.target: Ispravke za Windows 11:

segment.source: NVDA can once again announce Notepad status bar contents. (#14573)
segment.target: NVDA ponovo može da izgovara sadržaj statusne trake u beležnici. (#14573)

segment.source: Switching between tabs will announce the new tab name and position for Notepad and File Explorer. (#14587, #14388)
segment.target: Prebacivanje između kartica će izgovoriti ime i poziciju nove kartice u beležnici i istraživaču datoteka. (#14587, #14388)

segment.source: NVDA will once again announce candidate items when entering text in languages such as Chinese and Japanese. (#14509)
segment.target: NVDA će ponovo izgovarati dostupne unose kada se tekst piše na jezicima kao što su Kineski i Japanski. (#14509)

segment.source: It is once again possible to open the Contributors and License items on the NVDA Help menu. (#14725)
segment.target: Ponovo je moguće otvoriti listu saradnika ili licencu iz menija NVDA pomoći. (#14725)

segment.source: Microsoft Office fixes:
segment.target: Microsoft Office ispravke:

segment.source: When rapidly moving through cells in Excel, NVDA is now less likely to report the wrong cell or selection. (#14983, #12200, #12108)
segment.target: Kada se brzo krećete kroz ćelije u Excelu, manja je verovatnoća da će NVDA prijaviti pogrešnu ćeliju ili pogrešan izbor. (#14983, #12200, #12108)

segment.source: When landing on an Excel cell from outside a work sheet, braille and focus highlighter are no longer needlessly updated to the object that had focus previously. (#15136)
segment.target: Kada stanete na Excel ćeliju van radnog lista, brajev red i označavanje fokusa se više neće bespotrebno ažurirati na objekat koji je ranije bio fokusiran. (#15136)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to announce focusing password fields in Microsoft Excel and Outlook. (#14839)
segment.target: NVDA sada uspešno izgovara fokusiranje na polja za lozinke u programima Microsoft Excel i Outlook. (#14839)

segment.source: For symbols which do not have a symbol description in the current locale, the default English symbol level will be used. (#14558, #14417)
segment.target: Za simbole koji nemaju opis na trenutnom jeziku, podrazumevani Engleski nivo simbola će se koristiti. (#14558, #14417)

segment.source: It is now possible to use the backslash character in the replacement field of a dictionaries entry, when the type is not set to regular expression. (#14556)
segment.target: Sada je moguće koristiti znak obrnuta kosa crta u polju zamene unosa rečnika, kada vrsta nije podešena kao regularni izraz. (#14556)

segment.source: In Windows 10 and 11 Calculator, a portable copy of NVDA will no longer do nothing or play error tones when entering expressions in standard calculator in compact overlay mode. (#14679)
segment.target: In Windows 10 and 11 Calculator, a portable copy of NVDA will no longer do nothing or play error tones when entering expressions in standard calculator in compact overlay mode. (#14679)

segment.source: NVDA again recovers from many more situations such as applications that stop responding which previously caused it to freeze completely. (#14759)
segment.target: NVDA se ponovo oporavlja u brojnim slučajevima kao što su aplikacije koje više ne reaguju, što je ranije izazivalo da NVDA u potpunosti prestane da radi. (#14759)

segment.source: When forcing UIA support with certain terminal and consoles, a bug is fixed which caused a freeze and the log file to be spammed. (#14689)
segment.target: Kada naterate korišćenje UIA podrške u određenim Terminalima i konzolama, ispravljena je greška koja je izazivala rušenje i neprestano pisanje podataka u dnevniku. (#14689)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer refuse to save the configuration after a configuration reset. (#13187)
segment.target: NVDA više neće odbijati da sačuva podešavanja nakon vraćanja podešavanja na podrazumevana. (#13187)

segment.source: When running a temporary version from the launcher, NVDA will not mislead users into thinking they can save the configuration. (#14914)
segment.target: Kada se pokreće privremena verzija iz instalacije, NVDA neće korisnicima davati pogrešne informacije da podešavanja mogu biti sačuvana. (#14914)

segment.source: NVDA now generally responds slightly faster to commands and focus changes. (#14928)
segment.target: NVDA sada nešto brže reaguje na komande i promene fokusa. (#14928)

segment.source: Displaying the OCR settings will not fail on some systems anymore. (#15017)
segment.target: Prikazivanje OCR podešavanja više neće biti neuspešno na nekim sistemima. (#15017)

segment.source: Fix bug related to saving and loading the NVDA configuration, including switching synthesizers. (#14760)
segment.target: Ispravljena greška vezana za čuvanje i učitavanje NVDA podešavanja, uključujući menjanje sintetizatora. (#14760)

segment.source: Fix bug causing text review "flick up" touch gesture to move pages rather than move to previous line. (#15127)
segment.target: Ispravljena greška koja je izazvala da u pregledu teksta pokret "Povlačenje gore" pomera stranice umesto da pređe na prethodni red. (#15127)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promene za programere (engleski)

segment.source: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.
segment.target: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.

segment.source: Suggested conventions have been added to the add-on manifest specification.
segment.target: Suggested conventions have been added to the add-on manifest specification.

segment.source: These are optional for NVDA compatibility, but are encouraged or required for submitting to the Add-on Store. (#14754)
segment.target: These are optional for NVDA compatibility, but are encouraged or required for submitting to the Add-on Store. (#14754)

segment.source: Use `lowerCamelCase` for the name field.
segment.target: Use `lowerCamelCase` for the name field.

segment.source: Use `<major>.<minor>.<patch>` format for the version field (required for add-on datastore).
segment.target: Use `<major>.<minor>.<patch>` format for the version field (required for add-on datastore).

segment.source: Use `https://` as the schema for the url field (required for add-on datastore).
segment.target: Use `https://` as the schema for the url field (required for add-on datastore).

segment.source: Added a new extension point type called `Chain`, which can be used to iterate over iterables returned by registered handlers. (#14531)
segment.target: Added a new extension point type called `Chain`, which can be used to iterate over iterables returned by registered handlers. (#14531)

segment.source: Added the `bdDetect.scanForDevices` extension point.
segment.target: Added the `bdDetect.scanForDevices` extension point.

segment.source: Handlers can be registered that yield `BrailleDisplayDriver/DeviceMatch` pairs that don't fit in existing categories, like USB or Bluetooth. (#14531)
segment.target: Handlers can be registered that yield `BrailleDisplayDriver/DeviceMatch` pairs that don't fit in existing categories, like USB or Bluetooth. (#14531)

segment.source: Added extension point: `synthDriverHandler.synthChanged`. (#14618)
segment.target: Added extension point: `synthDriverHandler.synthChanged`. (#14618)

segment.source: The NVDA Synth Settings Ring now caches available setting values the first time they're needed, rather than when loading the synthesizer. (#14704)
segment.target: The NVDA Synth Settings Ring now caches available setting values the first time they're needed, rather than when loading the synthesizer. (#14704)

segment.source: You can now call the export method on a gesture map to export it to a dictionary.
segment.target: You can now call the export method on a gesture map to export it to a dictionary.

segment.source: This dictionary can be imported in another gesture by passing it either to the constructor of `GlobalGestureMap` or to the update method on an existing map. (#14582)
segment.target: This dictionary can be imported in another gesture by passing it either to the constructor of `GlobalGestureMap` or to the update method on an existing map. (#14582)

segment.source: `hwIo.base.IoBase` and its derivatives now have a new constructor parameter to take a `hwIo.ioThread.IoThread`.
segment.target: `hwIo.base.IoBase` and its derivatives now have a new constructor parameter to take a `hwIo.ioThread.IoThread`.

segment.source: If not provided, the default thread is used. (#14627)
segment.target: If not provided, the default thread is used. (#14627)

segment.source: `hwIo.ioThread.IoThread` now has a `setWaitableTimer` method to set a waitable timer using a python function.
segment.target: `hwIo.ioThread.IoThread` now has a `setWaitableTimer` method to set a waitable timer using a python function.

segment.source: Similarly, the new `getCompletionRoutine` method allows you to convert a python method into a completion routine safely. (#14627)
segment.target: Similarly, the new `getCompletionRoutine` method allows you to convert a python method into a completion routine safely. (#14627)

segment.source: `offsets.OffsetsTextInfo._get_boundingRects` should now always return `List[locationHelper.rectLTWH]` as expected for a subclass of `textInfos.TextInfo`. (#12424)
segment.target: `offsets.OffsetsTextInfo._get_boundingRects` should now always return `List[locationHelper.rectLTWH]` as expected for a subclass of `textInfos.TextInfo`. (#12424)

segment.source: `highlight-color` is now a format field attribute. (#14610)
segment.target: `highlight-color` is now a format field attribute. (#14610)

segment.source: NVDA should more accurately determine if a logged message is coming from NVDA core. (#14812)
segment.target: NVDA should more accurately determine if a logged message is coming from NVDA core. (#14812)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer log inaccurate warnings or errors about deprecated appModules. (#14806)
segment.target: NVDA will no longer log inaccurate warnings or errors about deprecated appModules. (#14806)

segment.source: All NVDA extension points are now briefly described in a new, dedicated chapter in the Developer Guide. (#14648)
segment.target: All NVDA extension points are now briefly described in a new, dedicated chapter in the Developer Guide. (#14648)

segment.source: `scons checkpot` will no longer check the `userConfig` subfolder anymore. (#14820)
segment.target: `scons checkpot` will no longer check the `userConfig` subfolder anymore. (#14820)

segment.source: Translatable strings can now be defined with a singular and a plural form using `ngettext` and `npgettext`. (#12445)
segment.target: Translatable strings can now be defined with a singular and a plural form using `ngettext` and `npgettext`. (#12445)

segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Deprecations

segment.source: Passing lambda functions to `hwIo.ioThread.IoThread.queueAsApc` is deprecated.
segment.target: Passing lambda functions to `hwIo.ioThread.IoThread.queueAsApc` is deprecated.

segment.source: Instead, functions should be weakly referenceable. (#14627)
segment.target: Instead, functions should be weakly referenceable. (#14627)

segment.source: Importing `LPOVERLAPPED_COMPLETION_ROUTINE` from `hwIo.base` is deprecated.
segment.target: Importing `LPOVERLAPPED_COMPLETION_ROUTINE` from `hwIo.base` is deprecated.

segment.source: Instead import from `hwIo.ioThread`. (#14627)
segment.target: Instead import from `hwIo.ioThread`. (#14627)

segment.source: `IoThread.autoDeleteApcReference` is deprecated.
segment.target: `IoThread.autoDeleteApcReference` is deprecated.

segment.source: It was introduced in NVDA 2023.1 and was never meant to be part of the public API.
segment.target: It was introduced in NVDA 2023.1 and was never meant to be part of the public API.

segment.source: Until removal, it behaves as a no-op, i.e. a context manager yielding nothing. (#14924)
segment.target: Until removal, it behaves as a no-op, i.e. a context manager yielding nothing. (#14924)

segment.source: `gui.MainFrame.onAddonsManagerCommand` is deprecated, use `gui.MainFrame.onAddonStoreCommand` instead. (#13985)
segment.target: `gui.MainFrame.onAddonsManagerCommand` is deprecated, use `gui.MainFrame.onAddonStoreCommand` instead. (#13985)

segment.source: `speechDictHandler.speechDictVars.speechDictsPath` is deprecated, use `NVDAState.WritePaths.speechDictsDir` instead. (#15021)
segment.target: `speechDictHandler.speechDictVars.speechDictsPath` is deprecated, use `NVDAState.WritePaths.speechDictsDir` instead. (#15021)

segment.source: Importing `voiceDictsPath` and `voiceDictsBackupPath` from `speechDictHandler.dictFormatUpgrade` is deprecated.
segment.target: Importing `voiceDictsPath` and `voiceDictsBackupPath` from `speechDictHandler.dictFormatUpgrade` is deprecated.

segment.source: Instead use `WritePaths.voiceDictsDir` and `WritePaths.voiceDictsBackupDir` from `NVDAState`. (#15048)
segment.target: Instead use `WritePaths.voiceDictsDir` and `WritePaths.voiceDictsBackupDir` from `NVDAState`. (#15048)

segment.source: `config.CONFIG_IN_LOCAL_APPDATA_SUBKEY` is deprecated.
segment.target: `config.CONFIG_IN_LOCAL_APPDATA_SUBKEY` is deprecated.

segment.source: Instead use `config.RegistryKey.CONFIG_IN_LOCAL_APPDATA_SUBKEY`. (#15049)
segment.target: Instead use `config.RegistryKey.CONFIG_IN_LOCAL_APPDATA_SUBKEY`. (#15049)

segment.source: A new option has been added, "Paragraph Style" in "Document Navigation".
segment.target: Dodata je nova opcija, "Stil pasusa" u "Navigaciji kroz dokument".

segment.source: This can be used with text editors that do not support paragraph navigation natively, such as Notepad and Notepad++.
segment.target: Može se koristiti sa uređivačima teksta koji ne podržavaju navigaciju po pasusima, kao što su Notepad i Notepad++.

segment.source: There is a new global command to report the destination of a link, mapped to `NVDA+k`.
segment.target: Dodata je nova komanda za prijavljivanje odredišta linka, sa prečicom `NVDA+k`.

segment.source: Support for annotated web content (such as comments and footnotes) has improved.
segment.target: Poboljšana podrška za anotiran Web sadržaj (kao što su komentari i fusnote).

segment.source: Press `NVDA+d` to cycle through summaries when annotations are reported (e.g. "has comment, has footnote").
segment.target: Pritisnite `NVDA+d` da kružite kroz kratke opise kada se prijave napomene (na primer "Ima komentar, ima fusnotu").

segment.source: Tivomatic Caiku Albatross 46/80 braille displays are now supported.
segment.target: Tivomatic Caiku Albatross 46/80 brajevi redovi su sada podržani.

segment.source: Support for ARM64 and AMD64 versions of Windows has improved.
segment.target: Poboljšana podrška za ARM64 verziju Windowsa.

segment.source: There are many bug fixes, notably Windows 11 fixes.
segment.target: Ispravljene su brojne greške, posebno u Windowsu 11.

segment.source: eSpeak, LibLouis, Sonic rate boost and Unicode CLDR have been updated.
segment.target: eSpeak, LibLouis, Sonic povećanje brzine i Unicode CLDR su ažurirani.

segment.source: There are new Georgian, Swahili (Kenya) and Chichewa (Malawi) braille tables.
segment.target: Dodate su nove Gruzijske, Swahili (Kenija) i Chichewa (Malawi) brajeve tabele.

segment.source: Note:
segment.target: Napomena:

segment.source: This release breaks compatibility with existing add-ons.
segment.target: Postojeći dodaci nisu kompatibilni sa ovom verzijom.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove karakteristike

segment.source: Microsoft Excel via UI Automation: Automatic reporting of column and row headers in tables. (#14228)
segment.target: Microsoft Excel uz UI Automation: automatsko prijavljivanje zaglavlja kolona i redova u tabelama. (#14228)

segment.source: Note: This is referring to tables formatted via the "Table" button on the Insert pane of the Ribbon.
segment.target: Napomena: ovo važi za tabele koje su formatirane korišćenjem dugmeta "Tabela" u oknu trake ubacivanja .

segment.source: "First Column" and "Header Row" in "Table Style Options" correspond to column and row headers respectively.
segment.target: "Prva kolona" i "red zaglavlja" u "opcijama stila tabele" su zaglavlja kolona i redova.

segment.source: This is not referring to screen reader specific headers via named ranges, which is currently not supported via UI Automation.
segment.target: Ovo ne utiče na zaglavlja koja su označena putem čitača ekrana kroz imenovane opsege, što trenutno nije podržano uz UI Automation.

segment.source: An unassigned script has been added to toggle delayed character descriptions. (#14267)
segment.target: Dodata je nedodeljena skripta za uključivanje i isključivanje odloženih opisa znakova. (#14267)

segment.source: Added an experimental option to leverage the UIA notification support in Windows Terminal to report new or changed text in the terminal, resulting in improved stability and responsivity. (#13781)
segment.target: Dodata eksperimentalna opcija za korišćenje UIA podrške za obaveštenja u Windows Terminalu za prijavljivanje novog ili promenjenog teksta, što će doneti poboljšanu stabilnost i brzinu. (#13781)

segment.source: Consult the user guide for limitations of this experimental option.
segment.target: Pogledajte korisničko uputstvo za ograničenja ove eksperimentalne opcije.

segment.source: On Windows 11 ARM64, browse mode is now available in AMD64 apps such as Firefox, Google Chrome and 1Password. (#14397)
segment.target: Na Windowsu 11 ARM64, režim pretraživanja je sada dostupan u AMD64 aplikacijama kao što su Firefox, Google Chrome i 1Password. (#14397)

segment.source: A new option has been added, "Paragraph Style" in "Document Navigation".
segment.target: Dodata je nova opcija, "Stil pasusa" u "navigaciji kroz dokument".

segment.source: This adds support for single line break (normal) and multi line break (block) paragraph navigation.
segment.target: Ovo dodaje podršku za navigaciju po pasusima u pojedinačnim novim redovima (standardna) i duplim novim redovima (blokovi).

segment.source: This can be used with text editors that do not support paragraph navigation natively, such as Notepad and Notepad++. (#13797)
segment.target: Ovo se može koristiti u uređivačima teksta koji ne podržavaju ugrađenu navigaciju po pasusima, kao što su Notepad i Notepad++. (#13797)

segment.source: The presence of multiple annotations are now reported.
segment.target: Ako postoji više napomena, sada će biti prijavljene.

segment.source: `NVDA+d` now cycles through reporting the summary of each annotation target for origins with multiple annotation targets.
segment.target: `NVDA+d` sada kruži kroz prijavljivanja kratkog opisa odredišta svake napomene za izvore koji imaju više odredišta napomena.

segment.source: For example, when text has a comment and a footnote associated with it. (#14507, #14480)
segment.target: Na primer, kada tekst ima komentar i fusnotu. (#14507, #14480)

segment.source: Added support for Tivomatic Caiku Albatross 46/80 braille displays. (#13045)
segment.target: Dodata podrška za Tivomatic Caiku Albatross 46/80 brajeve redove. (#13045)

segment.source: New global command: Report link destination (`NVDA+k`).
segment.target: Nova globalna komanda: prijavi odredište linka (`NVDA+k`).

segment.source: Pressed once will speak/braille the destination of the link that is in the navigator object.
segment.target: Ako se pritisne jednom, izgovara ili prikazuje na brajevom redu odredište linka u navigacionom objektu.

segment.source: Pressing twice will show it in a window, for more detailed review. (#14583)
segment.target: Ako se pritisne dva puta, biće prikazano u prozoru, za detaljniji pregled. (#14583)

segment.source: New unmapped global command (Tools category): Report link destination in a window.
segment.target: Nova nedodeljena globalna komanda (kategorija alati): prikaži odredište linka u prozoru.

segment.source: Same as pressing `NVDA+k` twice, but may be more useful for braille users. (#14583)
segment.target: Isto kao i kada se dva puta pritisne `NVDA+k`, ali može biti korisnije za korisnike brajevih redova. (#14583)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promene

segment.source: Updated LibLouis braille translator to [3.24.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.24.0). (#14436)
segment.target: Ažuriran LibLouis brajev prevodilac na [3.24.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.24.0). (#14436)

segment.source: Major updates to Hungarian, UEB, and Chinese bopomofo braille.
segment.target: Značajna ažuriranja za Mađarske, unificirane Engleske i Kineske bopomofo brajeve kodove.

segment.source: Support for the Danish braille standard 2022.
segment.target: Podrška za Danski brajev standard 2022.

segment.source: New braille tables for Georgian literary braille, Swahili (Kenya) and Chichewa (Malawi).
segment.target: Nove brajeve tabele za Gruzijski književni brajev kod, Swahili (Kenija) i Chichewa (Malawi).

segment.source: Updated Sonic rate boost library to commit `1d70513`. (#14180)
segment.target: Ažurirana Sonic biblioteka za povećanje brzine na commit `1d70513`. (#14180)

segment.source: CLDR has been updated to version 42.0. (#14273)
segment.target: CLDR je ažuriran na verziju 42.0. (#14273)

segment.source: eSpeak NG has been updated to 1.52-dev commit `f520fecb`. (#14281, #14675)
segment.target: eSpeak NG je ažuriran na 1.52-dev commit `f520fecb`. (#14281, #14675)

segment.source: Fixed reporting of large numbers. (#14241)
segment.target: Ispravljeno prijavljivanje velikih brojeva. (#14241)

segment.source: Java applications with controls using the selectable state will now announce when an item is not selected rather than when the item is selected. (#14336)
segment.target: Java aplikacije sa kontrolama koje se mogu izabrati će sada izgovoriti kada stavka nije izabrana, umesto kada je izabrana. (#14336)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravljene greške

segment.source: Windows 11 fixes:
segment.target: Windows 11 ispravke:

segment.source: NVDA will announce search highlights when opening Start menu. (#13841)
segment.target: NVDA će izgovoriti istaknute pretrage kada se otvori start meni. (#13841)

segment.source: On ARM, x64 apps are no longer identified as ARM64 applications. (#14403)
segment.target: na ARM verziji, x64 aplikacije se više ne označavaju kao ARM64 aplikacije. (#14403)

segment.source: Clipboard history menu items such as "pin item" can be accessed. (#14508)
segment.target: Sada možete pristupiti opcijama menija istorije privremene memorije kao što su "Zakači stavku". (#14508)

segment.source: In Windows 11 22H2 and newer, it is again possible to use mouse and touch interaction to interact with areas such as the system tray overflow window and "Open With" dialog. (#14538, #14539)
segment.target: Na Windowsu 11 22H2 i novijim, ponovo je moguće koristiti miš i ekran osetljiv na dodir za interakciju sa delovima kao što su prozor sistemske trake i dijalog "Otvori". (#14538, #14539)

segment.source: Suggestions are reported when typing an @mention in in Microsoft Excel comments. (#13764)
segment.target: Predlozi se sada prijavljuju kada upišete @spominjanje u Microsoft Excel komentarima. (#13764)

segment.source: In the Google Chrome location bar, suggestion controls (switch to tab, remove suggestion etc) are now reported when selected. (#13522)
segment.target: U Google Chrome adresnoj traci, kontrole predloga (prebaci se na karticu, ukloni predlog i tako dalje) se sada prijavljuju kada se izaberu. (#13522)

segment.source: When requesting formatting information, colors are now explicitly reported in Wordpad or log viewer, rather than only "Default color". (#13959)
segment.target: Kada zahtevate informacije o formatiranju, boje se sada prijavljuju u Wordpadu ili pregledniku dnevnika, umesto da samo čujete "Podrazumevana boja". (#13959)

segment.source: In Firefox, activating the "Show options" button on GitHub issue pages now works reliably. (#14269)
segment.target: U Firefoxu, aktiviranje dugmeta "Show options" na GitHub issues stranici sada ispravno radi. (#14269)

segment.source: The date picker controls in Outlook 2016 / 365 Advanced search dialog now report their label and value. (#12726)
segment.target: Kontrole birača datuma u dijalogu napredne pretrage programa Outlook 2016 / 365 sada prijavljuju svoju oznaku i vrednost. (#12726)

segment.source: ARIA switch controls are now actually reported as switches in Firefox, Chrome and Edge, rather than checkboxes. (#11310)
segment.target: ARIA kontrole prekidača se sada prijavljuju kao prekidači u pretraživačima Firefox, Chrome i Edge, umesto kao izborna polja. (#11310)

segment.source: NVDA will automatically announce the sort state on an HTML table column header when changed by pressing an inner button. (#10890)
segment.target: NVDA će automatski izgovoriti stanje sortiranja u zaglavlju kolone HTML tabele kada se promeni pritiskanjem unutrašnjeg tastera. (#10890)

segment.source: A landmark or region's name is always automatically spoken when jumping inside from outside using quick navigation or focus in browse mode. (#13307)
segment.target: Ime orjentira ili regiona će uvek automatski biti izgovoreno kada skočite do njega a pre toga ste bili van njega korišćenjem brze navigacije ili fokusiranja u režimu pretraživanja. (#13307)

segment.source: When beep or announce 'cap' for capitals is enabled with delayed character descriptions, NVDA no longer beeps or announces 'cap' twice. (#14239)
segment.target: Kada je omogućeno pištanje ili izgovor velikih slova uz odložene opise znakova, NVDA više neće reprodukovati pištanja ili izgovarati reč veliko dva puta. (#14239)

segment.source: Controls in tables in Java applications will now be announced more accurately by NVDA. (#14347)
segment.target: NVDA će sada preciznije izgovarati Kontrole tabela u Java aplikacijama. (#14347)

segment.source: Some settings will no longer be unexpectedly different when used with multiple profiles. (#14170)
segment.target: Neka podešavanja se više neće neočekivano razlikovati kada se koriste uz različite profile. (#14170)

segment.source: The following settings have been addressed:
segment.target: Sledeća podešavanja su ispravljena:

segment.source: Line indentation in Document formatting settings.
segment.target: Uvlačenje redova u podešavanjima formatiranja dokumenta.

segment.source: Cell borders in doc formatting settings
segment.target: Granice ćelija u podešavanjima formatiranja dokumenta

segment.source: Show messages in braille settings
segment.target: Prikazivanje poruka u brajevim podešavanjima

segment.source: Tether Braille in braille settings
segment.target: Vezivanje brajevog reda u brajevim podešavanjima

segment.source: In some rare cases, these settings used in profiles may be unexpectedly modified when installing this version of NVDA.
segment.target: U nekim retkim slučajevima, ova podešavanja koja se koriste u profilima će možda biti neočekivano promenjena kada se instalira ova NVDA verzija.

segment.source: Please check these options in your profiles after upgrading NVDA to this version.
segment.target: Molimo proverite ova podešavanja u vašim profilima nakon što ažurirate NVDA na ovu verziju.

segment.source: Emojis should now be reported in more languages. (#14433)
segment.target: Emoji znakovi će sada biti prijavljeni na više jezika. (#14433)

segment.source: The presence of an annotation is no longer missing in braille for some elements. (#13815)
segment.target: Postojanje napomena više neće nedostajati na brajevom redu za neke elemente. (#13815)

segment.source: Fixed an issue where config changes not save correctly when changing between a "Default" option and the value of the "Default" option. (#14133)
segment.target: Ispravljen problem koji je izazvao da se promene podešavanja ne čuvaju ispravno kada se menja između opcije koja je podrazumevana i vrednosti podrazumevane opcije. (#14133)

segment.source: When configuring NVDA there will always be at least one key defined as an NVDA key. (#14527)
segment.target: Kada se podešava NVDA, bar jedan taster će uvek biti podešen kao NVDA taster. (#14527)

segment.source: When accessing the NVDA menu via the notification area, NVDA will not suggest a pending update anymore when no update is available. (#14523)
segment.target: Kada pristupate NVDA meniju iz sistemske trake, NVDA više neće nuditi odloženo ažuriranje kada nema odloženog ažuriranja. (#14523)

segment.source: Remaining, elapsed and total time is now reported correctly for audio files over a day long in foobar2000. (#14127)
segment.target: Preostalo, proteklo i ukupno vreme se sada ispravno prijavljuje za zvučne zapise koje su duže od jednog dana u foobaru2000. (#14127)

segment.source: In web browsers such as Chrome and Firefox, alerts such as file downloads are shown in braille in addition to being spoken. (#14562)
segment.target: U Web pretraživačima kao što su Chrome i Firefox, upozorenja kao što su preuzimanja datoteke se prikazuju na brajevom redu uz izgovor. (#14562)

segment.source: Bug fixed when navigating to the first and last column in a table in Firefox (#14554)
segment.target: Ispravljena greška kada se pomerate na prvu ili poslednju kolonu tabele u Firefoxu (#14554)

segment.source: When NVDA is launched with `--lang=Windows` parameter, it is again possible to open NVDA's General settings dialog. (#14407)
segment.target: Kada se NVDA pokrene sa parametrom `--lang=Windows`, ponovo je moguće otvoriti NVDA dijalog opštih podešavanja. (#14407)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to continue reading in Kindle for PC after turning the page. (#14390)
segment.target: NVDA će sada ponovo nastaviti čitanje u programu Kindle za računare nakon što se promeni stranica. (#14390)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promene za programere (engleski)

segment.source: Note: this is an Add-on API compatibility breaking release.
segment.target: Note: this is an Add-on API compatibility breaking release.

segment.source: Add-ons will need to be re-tested and have their manifest updated.
segment.target: Add-ons will need to be re-tested and have their manifest updated.

segment.source: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.
segment.target: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.

segment.source: System tests should now pass when run locally on non-English systems. (#13362)
segment.target: System tests should now pass when run locally on non-English systems. (#13362)

segment.source: In Windows 11 on ARM, x64 apps are no longer identified as ARM64 applications. (#14403)
segment.target: In Windows 11 on ARM, x64 apps are no longer identified as ARM64 applications. (#14403)

segment.source: It is no longer necessary to use `SearchField` and `SuggestionListItem` `UIA` `NVDAObjects` in new UI Automation scenarios, where automatic reporting of search suggestions, and where typing has been exposed via UI Automation with the `controllerFor` pattern.
segment.target: It is no longer necessary to use `SearchField` and `SuggestionListItem` `UIA` `NVDAObjects` in new UI Automation scenarios, where automatic reporting of search suggestions, and where typing has been exposed via UI Automation with the `controllerFor` pattern.

segment.source: This functionality is now available generically via `behaviours.EditableText` and the base `NVDAObject` respectively. (#14222)
segment.target: This functionality is now available generically via `behaviours.EditableText` and the base `NVDAObject` respectively. (#14222)

segment.source: The UIA debug logging category when enabled now produces significantly more logging for UIA event handlers and utilities. (#14256)
segment.target: The UIA debug logging category when enabled now produces significantly more logging for UIA event handlers and utilities. (#14256)

segment.source: NVDAHelper build standards updated. (#13072)
segment.target: NVDAHelper build standards updated. (#13072)

segment.source: Now uses the C++20 standard, was C++17.
segment.target: Now uses the C++20 standard, was C++17.

segment.source: Now uses the `/permissive-` compiler flag which disables permissive behaviors, and sets the `/Zc` compiler options for strict conformance.
segment.target: Now uses the `/permissive-` compiler flag which disables permissive behaviors, and sets the `/Zc` compiler options for strict conformance.

segment.source: Some plugin objects (e.g. drivers and add-ons) now have a more informative description in the NVDA python console. (#14463)
segment.target: Some plugin objects (e.g. drivers and add-ons) now have a more informative description in the NVDA python console. (#14463)

segment.source: NVDA can now be fully compiled with Visual Studio 2022, no longer requiring the Visual Studio 2019 build tools. (#14326)
segment.target: NVDA can now be fully compiled with Visual Studio 2022, no longer requiring the Visual Studio 2019 build tools. (#14326)

segment.source: More detailed logging for NVDA freezes to aid debugging. (#14309)
segment.target: More detailed logging for NVDA freezes to aid debugging. (#14309)

segment.source: The singleton `braille._BgThread` class has been replaced with `hwIo.ioThread.IoThread`. (#14130)
segment.target: The singleton `braille._BgThread` class has been replaced with `hwIo.ioThread.IoThread`. (#14130)

segment.source: A single instance `hwIo.bgThread` (in NVDA core) of this class provides background i/o for thread safe braille display drivers.
segment.target: A single instance `hwIo.bgThread` (in NVDA core) of this class provides background i/o for thread safe braille display drivers.

segment.source: This new class is not a singleton by design, add-on authors are encouraged to use their own instance when doing hardware i/o.
segment.target: This new class is not a singleton by design, add-on authors are encouraged to use their own instance when doing hardware i/o.

segment.source: The processor architecture for the computer can be queried from `winVersion.WinVersion.processorArchitecture attribute.` (#14439)
segment.target: The processor architecture for the computer can be queried from `winVersion.WinVersion.processorArchitecture attribute.` (#14439)

segment.source: New extension points have been added. (#14503)
segment.target: New extension points have been added. (#14503)

segment.source: `inputCore.decide_executeGesture`
segment.target: `inputCore.decide_executeGesture`

segment.source: `tones.decide_beep`
segment.target: `tones.decide_beep`

segment.source: `nvwave.decide_playWaveFile`
segment.target: `nvwave.decide_playWaveFile`

segment.source: `braille.pre_writeCells`
segment.target: `braille.pre_writeCells`

segment.source: `braille.filter_displaySize`
segment.target: `braille.filter_displaySize`

segment.source: `braille.decide_enabled`
segment.target: `braille.decide_enabled`

segment.source: `braille.displayChanged`
segment.target: `braille.displayChanged`

segment.source: `braille.displaySizeChanged`
segment.target: `braille.displaySizeChanged`

segment.source: It is possible to set useConfig to False on supported settings for a synthesizer driver. (#14601)
segment.target: It is possible to set useConfig to False on supported settings for a synthesizer driver. (#14601)

segment.source: API Breaking Changes
segment.target: API Breaking Changes

segment.source: These are breaking API changes.
segment.target: These are breaking API changes.

segment.source: Please open a GitHub issue if your Add-on has an issue with updating to the new API.
segment.target: Please open a GitHub issue if your Add-on has an issue with updating to the new API.

segment.source: The configuration specification has been altered, keys have been removed or modified:
segment.target: The configuration specification has been altered, keys have been removed or modified:

segment.source: In `[documentFormatting]` section (#14233):
segment.target: In `[documentFormatting]` section (#14233):

segment.source: `reportLineIndentation` stores an int value (0 to 3) instead of a boolean
segment.target: `reportLineIndentation` stores an int value (0 to 3) instead of a boolean

segment.source: `reportLineIndentationWithTones` has been removed.
segment.target: `reportLineIndentationWithTones` has been removed.

segment.source: `reportBorderStyle` and `reportBorderColor` have been removed and are replaced by `reportCellBorders`.
segment.target: `reportBorderStyle` and `reportBorderColor` have been removed and are replaced by `reportCellBorders`.

segment.source: In `[braille]` section (#14233):
segment.target: In `[braille]` section (#14233):

segment.source: `noMessageTimeout` has been removed, replaced by a value for `showMessages`.
segment.target: `noMessageTimeout` has been removed, replaced by a value for `showMessages`.
